In other words, you surviving right now because the whale is somehow providing air for you in the stomach.

"So, are we going to sit idly or should we talk some more?", said the whale curiously, "First of all, How do you get here at the zoo in the first place?"
"I'm working as a night-watch around here. I'm responsible for checking whether everything's fine during the non-operating hours of the zoo. Today, I was given the responsibility of feeding the mammals at the aquarium exhibit....and that includes you.", you said as you realized that you are initially trying to feed the blue whale instead you were eaten by it.

The blue whale gleefully gave you a gentle hum in response. "Oh my! So we can get to see each other very often from now on.", said the whale excitedly, "It's such a pleasure to meet an interesting human like you. Let me introduce myself some more. My name is Nakii and as demonstrated by my ability to telepathically speak and ability to keep you comfortably in my stomach, I'm not an ordinary blue whale. The first human to ever discover my hidden secrets is you and I want you to keep this a secret fro others as I only intend for you to know and "enjoy" it. There are also many more things within me that you haven't discover yet and you are free to explore the world within me."

After hearing the blue whale, you were absolutely astounded. Just moments ago, everything seems mediocre and boring for you. But now, you happen to be inside the largest mammal on Earth that has extraordinary abilities. You take another breathtaking look around the large, fleshy stomach of the whale.

Then, you spot something. Near the 'front end' of the stomach, there is what looks like a "binocular viewfinder". The viewfinder is fleshy like the stomach wall it is attached to. It looks very similar in shape to a eye goggle and is recessed into the wall. You wondered whether this is the 'other things' that the blue whale mentioned. As your curiosity gets stronger and stronger, you strode across the stomach toward the viewfinder device. It was kind of a long way but you get there anyway. Once you're in front of the viewfinder-like thing, you placed you eyes toward the device and look out.

What you see is an amazing sight. You are looking up from the bottom of the aquarium you just fell in. The aquarium is brightly-lit and you can see the view heading toward the rumored secret cave that you frequently heard from the other staffs. The cave is said to lead to the wide ocean since the zoo itself is situated on the ocean side. A few minutes later, the blue whale is indeed in the open sea. You could also see the moonlight shimmering into the ocean, casting a uted blue lights into the surrounding water.

"Are you having fun with my "Whale-Vision?" , asked the whale telepathically. "What is the "Whale-Vision?", you asked curiously.

"Well. It is something that I naturally always have. It is a viewer that allows anyone in my stomach to see the outside world through my eyes so they won't get too bored while staying in me. And sometimes, my Whale-Vision allows you to know more about lifeforms in the ocean since I know essentially all there s to know about the ocean. Also, you can also use it to see something more intimate :)"

"COOL!!!", you said. "Now I can probably pass biology and science with straight A's. it's sooo cool to be in you, Nakii."

" That's excellent. Now, do you want to continue to use my Whale-Vision or do you want me to tell you more of what I can do?", asked the whale.
1531111.title: Conversing with the whale

choices: Who--or what--lives in Nakii's second stomach?
15311111.content:
While the Whale-Vision is very cool, there's nothing much to see yet. You're still relatively close to the coast, so all you see is the common fish that everyone sees in an aquarium. Besides, you're more interested in what Nakii said earlier about the 'world' inside her. Surely, Nakii didn't have an entire world within her! Of course, you just found out a way to see through the eyes of Nakii in her stomach...and she had said that she wasn't an ordinary whale. You take your eyes away from the viewfinder-thing while Nakii was passing by a small school of fish.

"What did you mean by the 'world' within you?" you ask.

"You have to go much deeper in me to find that out" said Nakii's voice inside you head. "it'll be much easier to show you then to tell you"

You shrug your shoulders and head for the "back end" of the stomach. Walking is becoming much easier, but still a little troublesome because Nakii isn't exactly holding still, but you do manage to stay on your feet. As you near the "back end" of the stomach, you notice two openings in the stomach wall. One looks like it could be the entrance to Nakii's bowels. The other opening has a small wooden sign next to it that simply says "The Inner World of Nakii". Not knowing what to expect, you go through the opening with the wooden sign in front of it.
As you walk through a tunnel, you start to notice that you're getting smaller....or that Nakii is getting bigger. All that you know for sure is that the tunnel you're in is getting bigger...radically bigger. Soon, you enter in what seems to be a second stomach which is even bigger than the stomach you were just in! The tunnel opens up to a huge chamber that you estimate is 300 feet long and about 500 feet high! Which seems impossible! Not only is the second stomach much bigger, but there are dwellings of some sort in here!
15311111.title: The world within the whale

choices: Go to Nakii's Brain to learn more about her
Explore the second stomach a bit more
153111112.content:
The second stomach is far huger than the first one. Your completely amazed by the discovery of a impossibly large interior in the whale. It now looks like a large auditorium or even a stadium. You can feel the gentle swaying of Nakii's swimming as she swims toward the deeper and wider seas. While you looked around, you spotted what looks like a small house at the front end of the second stomach. Strange, you thought. This is possibly one of things that Nakii has promise to show you. You went to check it out. There is no one living inside the house. As you look carefully at the house, you can see that it is made from Nakii's flesh which makes it flexible yet sturdy. When you enter the house, you discovered that it comprises of a bedroom and a small living room; even the furniture are are made of soft stomach flesh. You feel that the house and it "decor" strangely fits you taste as if Nakii had designed the house just for you.

"Surprised are you?", Nakii said delightedly, "I told you that I have many amazing features and this second stomach is just one of them and your the only one who will know it. I personally made this house for you. You may want to ask me how did I know about your taste? Well, besides talking telepathically, I can also do a bit of mind-reading."

"Whoa....I'm...totally...speechless.....", you said, "I never knew that blue whales have such abilities. Nakii, you are truly one special blue whale."

"I can see that you're very satisfied. There is just one little flaw in this house; although there is a little shower in it, there is no toilet.", said the whale blushingly, "Unfortunately, you will have to go to my bowels if you need to finish your business."

"That's fine for me since I can get to know more about you body parts.", you said.

After sitting on a fleshy cushion in the 'living room" for some rest, you went out of the house started to explore the huge stomach again.

You look around the second stomach and realize that there are 2 more tunnels leading to other parts of her HUGE body. The tunnels are currently puckered up rendering them currently impassable. Where will they lead to you wonder? What lies beyond them?

"Pondering about where those holes leads to?", the whale suddenly said in your head, "Do you to explore even more parts in me?

"Yeah sure", you replied.

"I'll tell where the 2 'tunnels' lead to. The first tunnel on the left leads to my brain. In my brain, you can get to see my "data bank" where we can share info about the sea or very "personal" things with each other without the risk of someone else knowing about it. I can also provide you with even more information about my other body parts and many more amenities.

"The other tunnel leads to my bowels.You would never really want to go there. As I said before, the only time you should go down there is if you feel the need to relief yourself, which my large intestines is more than capable of handling considering your size."

"So, where do you want to stay in my second stomach or head toward my brain now?", the whale asked.
153111112.title: Within Nakii's Second Stomach

choices: The two of you talk about yoursleves
You ask for a different setting
1531111121.content:
"I would like to see your brain" you say. As you say this, one of the puckered openings opens up and you step through it. You enter a small tunnel that ends at the foot of what looks like a spiraling staircase. The staircase is made out of flesh as well, just like the house you were in before. It certainly feels odd to walk up the staircase as every step you take makes a squishy sound. The staircase continues for what feels like two "floors"...if Nakii had "floors".
You made the decision of seeing Nakii's brain because you would like to learn more about her and her other body parts. But more importantly, when Nakii said something about 'very personal' things, her voice took on a romantic edge. You begin to wonder what other things Nakii has planned for you.
When you reach the end of the spiraling staircase, you come to another puckered opening which opens as you approach it. Beyond the puckered opening is a small room that looks like some kind of antechamber. The antechamber has several chairs and benches in it, as well as several beds. All were made out of flesh. You take a look around the chamber as you walk through it and spot another shorter staircase at the end of the chamber. The staircase leads to yet another puckered hole which opens as you approach it. You step through the opening and enter a vast chamber that contains Nakii's brain.
Nakii's brain is huge; it's probably forty feet in diameter. You're on a balcony of sorts that overlooks the brain. Every now and then, you see electrical charges running through the surface of the brain. You're amazed at what you see next; some kind of keyboard interface at the end of the balcony. You rush up to the keyboard. There's a monitor in front of the keyboard as well; at the moment, the monitor is showing Whale-Vision. Nakii is now deep into the ocean, heading for who knows what. You play around the keyboard a bit, and learn that Whale-Vision is only the default setting of this interface. There's a small menu with only ten choices;
1. Whale-Vision
2. 'Personal Interactions with Nakii'
3. Senses Control
4. Mind Control Options
5. Digestive
6. Map
7. Ocean-Net
8. Dreams
9. Memories
10. Direct Interface

Curious, you press the number 2. At first, nothing happens. Then, a beam of light shoots out from the brain to right besides you. In a matter of seconds, the beam of light morphs into a human female that's about your size. The human female kinda looks like a holographic projection for a handful of seconds until the image looks as real as you are. The woman is beautiful with high cheek bones and ocean-blue eyes, The woman is wearing a loose-fitting bikini. She's also wearing a necklace that has what looks like starfish on it. The woman looks to be in her early thirties. As you stare blankly at her, the woman grins at you.
"Who are you?" you ask.
"I'm Nakii, silly" said the woman, playfully pushing you back a step.
"You're....what's this?" you ask, reaching out to touch the human in front of you. You're able to touch the woman.
"Think of it as... a hologram of myself as a human" said the human Nakii. "this form of myself can only exist in here and in the chamber behind my brain"
"How is this even possible?" you ask, utterly flabbergasted at what you're seeing now.
"You ask too many questions" said the human Nakii, leaning forward suddenly and gives you a kiss right on the mouth! The kiss lasts for a minute, then you manage to pull away from her.
"I just thought you were in the mood for some 'fun' " said the human Nakii, actually doing the air quotes with her hands. "after all, a man has his needs, right?"
"Uh..." you say, not sure what to say to this.
The human Nakii looks around the brain chamber. "Here, let me take you to somewhere more appealing" Here, she half-drags you to the chamber that you had walked through earlier. As you re-enter the chamber, you gasp when you see the chamber has changed into some kind of resturant complete with waiters and other customers! You feel like you've just entered a holo-deck on the TV show Star Trek: The Next Generation!
"What's 'TV'?" asks the human Nakii, as she leads you to a table near the center of the resturant. "and what's a 'holo-deck'?"
You start to explain what a TV is as you take a seat at the table. Nakii takes a seat opposite you and just stares at you and smiles as you explain TV. This is truly weird! Now you're talking to Nakii in some kind of hologram form in the middle of her body in a chamber that can look like a resturant!
"It only gets weirder from here" said Nakii inside you head as the human Nakii laughs.
The resturant the two of you are in looks just like your favorite resturant! There are even windows that show parked cars and the street outside! There is no food, of course, but the illusion that people are eating. The resturant has no bathroom or even a kitchen. And there are other bizarre features; the couple sitting at the table besides you are what looks to be dophfins!
"I pulled this place from your memory" said Nakii, answering your unasked question. "I just felt that you would feel more comfortable in a familiar place. I added a few more...features to make it more interesting"
1531111121.title: Go to Nakii's Brain to learn more about her

choices: Try the (7. Ocean Net) or (4. Mind Control)
Try the (10. Direct Interface) or (8. Dreams)
15311111211.content:
Within the brain of the blue whale, the virtual restaurant that Nakii had created has certainly made you feel more at ease. Around you, the other 'customers' are all sea creatures like dolphins, fishes, and so on. The restaurant itself has a oceanic theme complete with "water-ripple" blue light effects, murals depicting beaches and the deep ocean, white sands for the flooring, and most strangely, a second Whale-Vision display right by your table, showing the deep sea gorges Nakii is currently swimming through. When you try to touch the 'walls' of the restaurant, the walls remain fleshy like it originally was before Nakii changed the setting. You guess that Nakii has done it to make her holographic environment more out of the ordinary for you. When you look onto the table, there are no plates or cutlery; there is only a plain-looking menu that simply contains only the words 'fish' and 'shrimp.' You conclude that is because since Nakii is a blue whale, her diet must contain only those things. Across the table, there sat the holographic human Nakii, seeming ever so attractive as she look at you with her ocean-blue eyes.

You started to talk: "Nakii, I never thought I would say this, but I really am starting to like you. Just a few hours ago, I was just merely a ordinary night-watch at the zoo and now, I'm sitting here within your brain and enjoying what may be my first date with a blue whale. Why are you doing this all for me?"

Nakii paused for while and said: "Because I felt so lonely without someone who is really close to me. Back there at the zoo aquarium, I was the only blue whale there and all I could see were the countless other humans who stare at me in awe through glass windows. They were merely there to see me perform some kind of tricks and not really to know more about me. But that changed tonight: I was again swimming all by myself in that confined aquarium, then I saw you at the poolside, trying to feed me. The moment I saw you, I know you were different; special in some ways. So, I ate you and let you explore my interior. It is then that I realized that I was right: you really DO want to know more about me. I'm just more than happy to get to know you."

"You must have been through a lot this whole time.", you said, "Since I've also been through similar experiences, I know how it feels like. But now, the more I explore you (both your interesting interiors and your character), the more I love you."

The human Nakii looked out of her Whale-Vision and turned back toward you beaming with a big smile: "Thank you. I don't how I should thank you. So..... do you want to explore more parts and things within me?"

"Of course", you said. Together with the human Nakii, you got out of your chairs and head back to the puckered hole leading to the central control. After you entered the brain chamber, you heard the whale Nakii speak to you again: "So you really interact well with my holographic self. I guess that we are really meant to be together. Right now, I'm going to temporarily turn off the "Personal Interactions", because I don't want to spoil your fun-filled exploration of me."

As the whale said so, the holographic human Nakii tell you to have fun before slowly fading out with a little smile.

You return to the balcony in Nakii's huge brain and began to operate the interface of the "Nakii PC" you played with previously. You come across the 10 choices again. As you scan the choices on the display, you decided that you need to get a rough idea of the scale of 'Nakii's World' so you choose the "Map" button for more information. Almost immediately, the large 'screen' before you refreshed and displayed the information you want. "WHOA!!!", you exclaimed in amazement. The map depicts a cutaway map of Nakii that shows the endless variety of organs and body parts you can go to. You appear on the map as a tiny blinking dot in the brain area; you explored only about 5% of Nakii's interior.

Considering that it is impossible to explore Nakii all at once, you decide to stay in the brain to try out more of the choices presented on the "Nakii PC". The four that interests you the most are (7. Ocean-Net), (4. Mind Control Options), (10. Direct Interface), and (8. Dreams).

Which one do you choose?
15311111211.title: Conversation and More of Nakii's World

choices: The dream leads you to the city
the dream leads you  somewhere else
153111112112.content:
Your finger hovers over the Direct Interface choice before you decide to choose the "dreams" option. Once you've pressed the number 8, the "screen" in front of you shows at least two dozen icons that represent the most current dreams that Nakii had been having. You pick one of the icons at random by actually touching the "screen" and see what dream you've just uncovered. You see yet another screen with "Interact with the dream? Yes or No?" and another option that asks "What is interaction with a dream?". You blink several times before pressing the other option; you would like to learn more about "interacting" with a dream. The following text shows up;

"Interacting with a dream means that you take part in a selected dream as if you were in the dream itself. While in a dream, you cannot control what happens unless you pick the "lucid dream" option provided when you choose to interact with the dream. The "lucid dream" option gives you partial control of the dream. The length of the dream cannot be made longer or shorter than it actually was. No harm will come to the user no matter what happens in the dream. You may view a dream before you decide to interact with it"


"Interesting..." you mutter, as you return to the previous screen. You press the "no" option and another option picks shows up if you would like to view the dream from your current location. You pick "yes" and the "screen" in front of you goes black for a handful of beats then it shows you the dream you've selected. The dream starts in a city...New York maybe? The skyline of the city gives you vague hints as to what city it actually is. The city looks like any other human city, besides the face that it's entirely populated by fish, sharks and other underwater wildlife. The dream then focuses on what looks like a mall called "Moby Dick's Mall". You blink at the name and wonder how did Nakii know of Moby Dick? The dream goes into the mall and into a small grocery store where Nakii herself is shopping, picking out tins of sardines. Nakii is humming to herself when a hammerhead shark bumps into her and steals her purse. Nakii then proceeds to chase the hammerhead through several stores of the mall until she corners it and eats it. What happens next is very similar to what happens in a certain comic that you've seen on the internet some months ago. Once Nakii had eaten the hammerhead, she goes on a binge and eats everything she comes across. Eventually, Nakii eats the city and the world and....that's where the dream ends. You stare at the "screen" and decide to pick another dream at random. This time, you decide to interact with the dream before viewing it. You don't choose the "lucid" option because you want to be surprised. The dream interaction takes place in the chamber you were earlier, so you you head to the "holo-deck" for lack of a better term.
The dream puts you at what looks to be the bottom of the ocean. It should've been pitch black, but it's not. Meaning you can see the many outlandish creatures that live deep in the ocean. It takes a few minutes before you realize that you're seeing everything by echo-location. You must be taking Nakii's place in the dream as she experienced it. The clicking sounds are coming from you as you walk along the ocean's floor....or swimming above the floor of the ocean. Suddenly, a city comes into view; a city encased in a huge bubble....much like the underwater city from The Phantom Menace. You veer off suddenly, not wanting to get too close to the city. You can't tell if the city is inhabited at this distance, though.
153111112112.title: Do whales dream of electric eels?

choices: Take the Nakii-Metro to her eyes, hearts, lungs, balance mechanisms, and more
Stay and play with the Ocean-net/ Direct Interface/Senses Control/ etc.
1531111121121.content:
You were amazed by the contents of Nakii's vore dream. How is it possible for her to know what it's like in human society let alone the concept of robbery. Additionally, you're kinda attracted to her type of dreams because you also secretly into the concept of "vore." You guess that she initially ate you because she shares your fantasies of eating someone or being eaten. Since Nakii is a blue whale , which is the largest animals on Earth, you weren't surprised by her obsession with devouring smaller things around her.

Now, within the "holo-deck" in Nakii's brain, you are about to experience another of her dream, this time in person. From your point of view, the "holo-deck" now looks like a 360 degree surround theater Nakii's view gradually takes you toward the underwater city. From afar, the underwater city gives off a yellow glow that mix in with the blue-green hue of the water around you, creating a mysterious and welcoming aura. As you got closer to the city, you saw that the building complex within is made from coral reef. When she swims into the city you saw a large sign saying "Imagination".

"Imagination? What kind of imagination does Nakii dream of?", you thought, "Well, it's probably the best to watch on and find out since Nakii is always being so enigmatic."

Once Nakii swam into the coral reef building, your surrounding changed into that of a brightly-lit ocean with sparkling white sands and colorful fishes. In this new environment, you look around yourself in awe. You have never seen anything place so beautiful; it's even more colorful than those tropical ocean pictures in the zoo's gallery. Then, another blue whale appeared in front of your eyes and it's heading in your direction. Initially, you thought that it will collide with you so you shut your eyes tightly. But instead of feeling a big bump, you feel the blue whale nudge up against you, brushing against your mouth in an suggestive manner. Then...it dawns on you. Nakii is dreaming about being with another whale and expressing their love for each other. You feel yourself continuously "kissing" and "nudging" the other whale for 2 minutes before the "holo-deck" brightened up and revert to its original state.

Nakii's dreams are one the most tantalizing experience you have had as of yet in the whale's body.

"Are you enjoying my dreams?", Nakii asked you telepathically.
"Of course I do. They are just so REAL....and stimulating", you answered.

Nakii gave you a heartfelt laugh and said: "I've had that dream sometimes ago when I felt lonely and isolated. Before you came, I only find companionship within dreams and waking up to the reality that those friends are merely my imagination is quite hard for me. But now, you have made up for that emptiness within me and you are now always free to enjoy my other dreams at any other time. "

As you hear Nakii, you strolled back from the "holo-deck" back to her brain room and toward the "Nakii-PC" at the balcony overlooking her brain.

"So besides, the 10 options presented here on your "PC-interface", where else can I do within you?", you asked interestedly.

Nakii replied: "Do you see the stair case to the right of the balcony you're at? Those stairs will lead you to the starting point of my spinal cord within my brain. Once you get there, you will be able to access my Nakii-Metro, a 1-person transporter that goes the entire length of my spine. The whole "tunnel" is about 5.0 km (8 mi) long if I estimate your sizes correctly. Each of my rib will act like a 'station' where you can get out to explore. You can use the Nakii-Metro to travel into my eyes, heart, large lungs, balance mechanisms and more places which I intend for you to explore. This little tour will be very amusing. I promise."

"So.... do you want to take the transport to see the rest of me or do you wish to stay here to try out more of the options on my interface?"
1531111121121.title: Nakii Adventure

choices: Go back to the Nakii-Metro and go to the next "station"
15311111211211.content:
You take the staircase to the right of the balcony and walk down it, coming to the level of Nakii's brain. There's a path that was completely hidden by the balcony that leads to a tunnel opening some 20 or 40 feet away. The path is alongside Nakii's brain and you can't help but touch the brain. It was amazingly soft. Once you've made it to the "tunnel" entrance, you see the massive brain stem that holds up the brain. The tunnel goes on past the brain stem and into what looks to be an ordinary subway station. Nakii's spinal cord was as thick as a redwood tree trunk and the "Nakii-Metro" was sitting right on top of it. The "Nakii-Metro" was half the size of a real subway car. You get on board the Nakii-Metro--which looks to be made out of both bone and flesh--via a short staircase.
Inside the Nakii-Metro, there is some kind of control panel. On the panel, it shows you the "stations" where you can get off and explore. Currently, the Nakii-Metro is at the "Brain"....while the next station takes you close to the massive eyes of Nakii. There are at least twenty other stations, all leading to the various parts of Nakii's body. The very last "station" is actually inside the tail of Nakii which is marked as "Balance control". Near the middle of the spinal cord is a "station" marked with "Milk Production". As a mammal, you knew that Nakii produces milk but you thought it odd that it should be marked that way. You shake your head and make your selection with the dial-like device that controls the Nakii-Metro. You're going to stop at the eyes first, and then make your way down from there. The Nakii-Metro springs to life and starts to move.
The trip doesn't take all that long; 4 minutes at the most. When the Nakii-Metro stops, you get off and head for another tunnel opening. On the ceiling of the tunnel there's bundles of wires that must be nerves that go from the eyes to the brain of Nakii. The tunnel is 40 feet high and perhaps 60 feet wide. The tunnel gets slightly narrower as you go on, but still big enough for you to walk comfortably in. When you've walked about a mile, you come to a huge vaulted chamber. On one wall of the chamber is the IMAX version of Whale-Vision. You walk into the chamber, only to discover that you can't pass a certain point; a thin membrane stops you. On the other side of the membrane is what looks like water.
The IMAX Whale-Vision is showing some sort of underwater canyon that's incredibly deep.
"That's the Marianas Trench as you humans call it" said Nakii in you head.
"That's on the other side of the world" you blurt out.
"Well, I'm a fast swimmer" laughs Nakii. "we marine animals simply call it 'The Deep Valley'"
"Wait...how do you know the names..." you trail off, remembering that Nakii could read you mind. You continue to look for a handful of minutes before you spot something in the ocean. It's a submarine not far from Nakii. Nakii keeps her distance from the submarine.
"Is that one of ours?" you wonder out loud.
"I don't know, nor do I care" said Nakii. "I usually ignore those things"
15311111211211.title: The Eyes

choices: Press the information button to get some ideas  before making your decision
153111112112111.content:
Nakii stopped herself at the edge of a trench, awaiting your answers on what you're going to do. From Nakii's eyes, the view of the surrounding of the Mariana Trench are dark blue and muted. You thought it going to be pitch dark in such a deep part of the ocean. Then you remembered that blue whales have excellent sights even when it's dark. Basically, what you are seeing is a view that Nakii has "converted" to allow you to see, much like with the case of the other Whale-Vision viewers within her. As you try to peer toward the submarine, you lean against the membrane that is Nakii's eyes to get a better look. The membrane feels glassy but also flexible like rubber or jello. It feels ice cold so you estimate the temperature outside must be below 10C (50F). You also feel the turgid sea water vibrating against Nakii's eye membrane. As you're now in a better position, you have a very clear view of the submarine right in front of you.

Looking at the submarine from Nakii's IMAX eyes, you determine that it is some type of military submarine on a reconnaissance mission based on the pale military numbering on its side. Compared to Nakii, the submarine seems smaller. So...Nakii does have the power to enlarge herself at will. Besides that, there is nothing else to see in the featureless darkness of the Marianas Trench. So you decided to go with Nakii's decision to ignore the submarine and focus more on her other parts.

"Well, since it's still nighttime and we aren't in any interesting places yet, may be you should take your time to explore some other parts of my body", Nakii said charmingly.
"Hmm, you're right. It's a good idea to be back here when there is something good to see. For now, there are a lot more important things for me to do", you said.

You head back toward the eye tunnel as Nakii swims a little faster, taking the submarine out of her view. After a few minutes walk through the wide tunnel, you returned to the 'station' and entered the '1-person' "Nakii-Metro." As you sat on your fleshy seat, you take a look at the map that is displayed on the control panel in front of you.

The displayed map shows a cut-away outline of Nakii and the 20 or more 'stations' that you can travel to:

Nakii's World Map*
Brain / Eyes / Heart / Lungs / Nakii's Store / Sea Oxygen Converter / Second Stomach / Liver / Musical Chamber / Sleep-Wave Producer

Milk Production / Liver / Nakii's Restaurant / Food Storage / Fresh-Water Storage Tank / Nakii's Computer Room / Personal Bedroom / Birth Chamber

Bowel (Restroom) / Balance Control

*Note: There are more "branch stations" that Nakii can take you to when she wants to.

Your stare at the stations presented on the map. Many are them are next to impossible to exist in a blue whale, the most mysterious is the note at the bottom of the screen that mentioned "other stations". With so many places presented to go, you think you need to go to each place one-by-one.

The screen suddenly displayed a short message:
"If you got any problems about your destination, you can press the "information" button on this control panel to get some ideas of my body parts."
------Nakii

You placed your hand on the dial control to choose your next destination. So, where are you going?
153111112112111.title: Go back to the Nakii-Metro and go to the next &...

choices: Go to any other of the "stations"
1531111121121112.content:
You press the "information" button to get a better idea on Nakii's other body parts. This is what you get:

Heart/Lungs

My lungs are as big as a football stadium. They would have to be when you think about it. I can hold my breath for about 3 hours, then I would need to surface to get some air. The station that'll take you to my lungs will also take you to my heart. While you're able to see my heart, you won't be able to be inside my heart because 1) you can't breathe in my heart and 2) I don't like the idea of you cruising through my bloodstream.


Nakii's Store

This is where you can get toys of Nakii....among other things, but I'll keep those other things a secret

Sea Oxygen Converter


I can also breathe in sea water in an emergency. This is where I can change ocean water to oxygen...as much as I need.


Second Stomach

The larger stomach inside Nakii you were in earlier.



You skip some of the information until you come to "Milk Production" since you were very curious to see that on the map.

Milk Production

As with all mammals, Nakii produces milk...and a lot of it. Nakii can produce as much as 2,000 gallons and as few as 2 gallons. While visiting at Milk Production, you can drink Nakii's milk if you so desire. A word of warning, though; Blue Whale milk is extremely fattening. Drinking just one drop of Nakii's milk will earn you around 50 pounds! So, drinking large amounts of Nakii's milk isn't recommended. If you do drink large amounts of milk, you can always go to the treadmill right at the Milk Production station to walk the weight off. The treadmill can support any weight, so don't worry about breaking it!


Next, you click information about the "Birth Chamber"


Birth Chamber

The womb of Nakii where baby whales are born. This chamber is mostly filled with water and other bodily fluids. Should you decide to dive into the chamber, an umbilical cord will come and attach itself to your belly button. You can see the egg cells that would become baby whales if Nakii finds a mate.


Liver

Pretty much self explainatory (?).

Food Storage

A Third Stomach of sorts. This is where I save food for later if I'm going anywhere where food is scarce. Should I decided to digest my stored food, there's a tube within there that leads to my first stomach. Food Storage contains only sea water and not stomach acid. Currently, Food Storage is half-full.

Fresh-Water Storage Tank

For those of us that can't drink ocean water, there's a steady supply of fresh water so there's no need worry about dying of thirst.



Nakii's Resturant

This is where you can eat and cook anything that I eat. While my diet consists of mostly fish, shrimp, the occasional shark, etc....you can request that I can eat whatever you would like to eat.


Nakii's Computer Room

This is my computer room, where you can access Ocean-Net. Ocean-Net is the marine animal's internet....kind of. Here, you can find out what's going on in the world above or below the surface.


Personal Bedroom

It's a bedroom made especially for you! While you can live in the Second Stomach, the Bedroom has everything that a bedroom has; a bed, closet, clock, radio, etc.


Bowel

Your bathroom. Not a very nice place to stay for long amounts of time unless you enjoy the smell of....uhh...waste.

Musical Chamber

This is where Nakii sings from! Why do whales sing? Well...it's awfully complicated to explain. Singing is like gossip for whales, only we sing it. Singing also serves as a way to attract mates. There are other things for you to do here, but why ruin the surprise?
1531111121121112.title: Press the information button to get some ideas ...

15311111211211121.content:
When you finished reading the basic information of each 'station', all of the choices seem enticing and attractive in your opinion. First, you decided to visit the Lung/ Heart since it's the next station on the list. You turned the dial on the control panel, setting it to Lung/ Heart and the Nakii-Metro once again churns to life, taking you toward your next destination.

After a few minutes, the Nakii-Metro arrived at the Lungs of the blue whale. You got off the transporter and headed toward the access way leading to the lungs. The tunnel is far huger than the one you saw in Nakii's eyes; the tunnel is about 50 ft wide and 70 ft tall. As you continue to walk, the tunnel seem to get bigger and bigger until you got into wide-opened space that could only be the lungs. You wonder what kind of things could you find here in this wide expanse.

Nakii was right, her lungs are gargantuan and by judging from its massive scale, it can more than easily house a large stadium. The edge of the lung nearly stretch toward the horizon from you perspective. You can hear Nakii's rhythmic breathing as you move toward the center of her lung. Gentle breeze of fresh air blows around you and you take the opportunity to refresh yourself. The air you breath in has a hint of seawater in it.

"Welcome to my lungs," said Nakii, "This is the place where I store oxygen to enable me to remain underwater for up to 4 hours. Conversely, these huge lungs of mine also allows me to provide you with air; if I weren't to surface the sea, the oxygen in one lung will be enough to sustain you for a whole week. And as I said before, my heart and lungs are interconnected and if you want to visit my heart, you can get there by heading for the tunnel that connects both of y lungs. Within that tunnel, there is another passage way that will ultimately ends at my heart."

"That's nice. I think I will take my time to see your heart for myself", you said.

You head toward the tunnel that leads to the heart. A small sign reads: "To Nakii's Heart 1mi (1.6km)". Well, it looks like you have to take some time to get there.

After traveling for what feels like 10 minutes, you finally arrived at another chamber. The room is circular in shape and at the dead center, there stood Nakii's massive heart. The heart is about the size of a large hot-air balloon and pink in color. Nakii's heartbeat is loud but soothing in your opinion; it has some kind of calming effects on you. In other words, it's almost music to your ear. Near the bottom of the heart, there is a large sign containing some fun facts:

1) "Nakii's heart is one of the most massive in existence. It is heavier than a truck with a full-load.
2) "The energy that this heart create will generate enough electricity to power the entire population of the country.
3) "If Nakii wants to, she can automatically modify the pace of her heart based on her demands."

"Incredible isn't it?, Nakii asked you, "It might be other-worldly experience for you since you never saw the heart of blue whale, right?"

"Uhm...This more than mind-blowing for me, having this rare opportunity to see your heart which I consider to be the most beautiful thing I have seen so far in you.", you answered with enthusiasm.

"So, do you want to head toward the next station, that is, my personal "Nakii's Store"?, the blue whale asked.

Since you're curious about the store and the secrets that Nakii previously said that the store contains, you answered 'yes' and make your way back toward the Nakii-Metro.

You entered the transporter and turn the dial on the panel, ready to head for your next destination: Nakii's Store.

What would you find there?
15311111211211121.title: Proceed to Heart and Lungs

choices: What else is in the store
You decide to drink all of the bottles of milk in the store
153111112112111211.content:
The Nakii-Metro makes it way to the next station, Nakii's Store. You don't know quite what to expect at the store. A few minutes later, the Nakii-Metro stops and you get off. Instead of just one tunnel at the station, there's two tunnels. One tunnel is marked with a sign that saids "To The Store" and the other tunnel is marked with a sign that said "The Sanctum" . You don't remember anything about a "Sanctum" on the map....you shrug and head for the store. The Store is buried deeply inside Nakii's body, so it takes you a good twenty minutes to get to the store. During your walk, you see other tunnels spliting off of the one that leads to the Store. The other tunnels are marked with "Second Stomach" , "Fresh-Water Storage Tank" and so on. It seems that you can walk from place to place inside Nakii's body. If that were true, it would take a long time to see everything in Nakii's body.
The Store looks just like any other store you've been too. In the store was all kinds of stuff, including an absolutely huge plush toy that looks like Nakii. The plush toy is about ten feet long and is on display on a large table that was filled with other smaller plush toys. The other plush toys were all marine animals. There's also large bottles of "Nakii's Milk" in a large refridgerator...and it is a REAL fridge too, complete with electricity! It must be powered by Nakii's heart somehow. You take out a bottle of milk, opened it and take a small sip of it. The milk is delicious! But it's also very fattening, as Nakii warned you before. You must've gained near 30 pounds with that one little sip! You begin to wonder how much weight you can gain with all the milk in the fridge...there's at least thirty bottles! All of the bottles is one gallon. You shrug and take another small sip of the milk, gaining another 60 pounds! What surprises you is that despite all the weight you've gained by drinking the milk, you don't feel any heavier....just a little heavier. You close the milk bottle and continue to explore the store.
153111112112111211.title: The Store

1531111121121112111.content:
You decided that it would be a bad idea to drink more of Nakii's milk so you place the bottle of Nakii's milk back into the fridge and went on to explore other parts of the store. You remember that Nakii has mentioned about other secrets within this store and now, you really want to explore those secrets. The store is quite large; it three times larger than your typical department store. In keeping with the theme of the sea, the store is decorated with fishing nets, beautiful beach murals, and gentle blue lights with the sound of ocean wave playing over 'intercom systems' that look like Nakii's eardrums. You also note that the store is made of flesh just like other parts within Nakii and the racks are made of her bones. The floor is quite bouncy and you feel like you're jumping with each step you're taking.

As you went through the store, you saw aisles after aisles of 3-foot Nakii plush dolls, postcards, magazines, towels, boardgames, attractive posters, and countless other items. All of them look extremely collectible in your opinion, especially those posters and plush dolls of her which you plan to have and display in the "Personal Bedroom" once you get there. But something struck you, how is it possible for Nakii to have all these merchandise in her and how did she know the popular merchandises in a souvenir shop?

"I made all the things myself", said Nakii as-matter-of-factly, "I have a small production facility within me that makes everything you see here. Obviously, I monitored, designed, and perfected the products all by myself. If you're curious to how I know these item, I've been in the zoo for a very long time and I've seen countless humans going crazy my stuffs like toys and pictures. In this store, everything is designed to suit your taste and preferences so feel free to shop around. And if I can, I would strongly suggest the plush dolls and the posters."

"I love the things displayed here, Nakii. But, what exactly are the secret items you promised me?", you asked.

Suddenly, the intercom system stopped playing the sound of ocean waves. On the intercom, you now hear the voice of Nakii talking to you.

"Attention shoppers.... Oops...since I only got you within me, that's not necessary. Welcome to Nakii's Store. Here you can get every kind of items about me. If you prefer to look for the secret items, you will have to go farther into my store to find out", answered Nakii teasingly, "I'm sure you'll find it....amusing."

As you look further into the store, you find an aisle that is labeled "Nakii's Secret." You quickly paced toward the aisle and the sight you saw has gotten you by surprise.

What is it that Nakii has that surprises you so much?
1531111121121112111.title: Other parts of the Store

choices: There's one other item on the second floor
return to the first floor of the store
15311111211211121111.content:
You eagerly rush to the aisle that's labeled "Nakii's Secret Items" , and you enter the aisle and find.....absolutely nothing. Well, that's not true. You do see rows of empty racks and signs that say that you're almost to the secret items! The secret items must be further down the aisle, so you continue down the aisle for the secret items that Nakii told you about. As you walk down the seemingly endless aisle, you notice that the floor is steadily slanted downward.
Finally, you reach near the end of the aisle and see items on the racks. One item is a SCUBA suit that looks like an ordinary one. But as you read the information about the suit, you learn that it's that "Special Limited Nakii SCUBA Suit" that'll let you breath underwater as long as Nakii has air in her lungs..and that the suit recycles ocean water into breathable oxygen! You look at another item, which looks like a deflated beach ball. It's the "Ever-Growing Beach Ball" that has no limit on how big it can get! That doesn't mean that it'll keep growing if you should blow into it, just that it has no limits on how big it can get. This reminds you of a dream you had long ago about beach balls falling from space of all shapes and sizes! You look at another Special Item and see that it's a harpoon gun with the words "Shark-Slayer 3000" written on its side. You reach the end of the aisle then and see that the aisle ends with what looks like a glass elevator. Neon signs and arrows point to the elevator, proclaiming that a "one-of-a-kind" item is located just one floor below! The Store has TWO floors?! You look again at the special items up here before making the decision on seeing the one-of-a-kind item. You step into the elevator and push the "down" arrow. The elevator lurches to life and starts to go down.
"With this item, you can adjust my size on the outside as well as the inside" said Nakii's voice as the elevator stops on the second floor of the store. You step off the elevator. The second floor of the store is just one big room with only one item in it; It's a clear pearl the size of a small marble sitting on a table. You pick up the item and look closely at it. There's some kind of liquid inside the tiny pearl that glows with a pale white light. You look at the table and see a note there that says "Do NOT break open the pearl"
"Ordinary, I have limited control of how big or small I can make myself from the outside to the inside" said Nakii. "but this item has total and complete control over my size both on the inside and the outside. Don't ask how or why it's there or how it works. All I know is that you shouldn't break it open...not that it's easy to break open"
"Interesting" you say, still examining the pearl.
"I just thought you might need it, should you need more room inside me" said Nakii.
"I think there's enough room for me in here" you laugh, pocketing the pearl.
15311111211211121111.title: The Pearl

153111112112111211112.content:
After taking the "pearl" with you, you decided to return to the first floor of the store and browse for more stuffs.
Back at the first floor of the store, you continued to look through the aisles for more stuffs, particularly the posters and plushies.

You take a look at several of the posters displayed on the wall. Each one of them feature Nakii as a blue whale in her gracious and majestic shapes. Some of the posters feature Nakii in suggestive postures while swimming. You take one of them for yourself and continue browsing other goods.

You came across the many plush toys of Nakii. Each one of them are highly detailed; from the color of her eyes to the fine details on her fins. The plushies come in a huge variety of size, from a key chain-sized for your cellphone to the huge ten-foot Nakii you saw at the store entrance. After much pondering, you decided to get the 3-foot Nakii plush.

After getting the plush and a couple of posters, you went to what you expect would be the cashier desk, but instead, a sign read that you are free to take the things you want from the store.


You returned to the Nakii-Metro to go on to the next destination, but you are feeling exhausted after such a long time of exploring Nakii's interior. You tell Nakii that you are heading for the "Personal Bedroom" for some rest. Nakii agreed to take you to the 'personal bedroom' and she tells you that she saved something for you in the room.
153111112112111211112.title: return to the first floor of the store

choices: You wake up in the morning, ready to explore more of Nakii's body parts
You sleep in like you usually do
1531111121121112111121.content:
The Nakii-Metro takes you directly to the "Personal Bedroom" station where you sleepily get off and enter the tunnel that'll lead to your bedroom. You carry all the stuff you got at the store in a cart that was provided for you while you were leaving the store. The cart is a real shopping cart, and you wonder where did Nakii get such a thing inside her?
You enter your bedroom and look around it. The bed that's within the room looks to be made out of pure blubber. You cringe at the sight of the bluish-white blubber, and then you reach out to touch it. It's incredibly soft but firm. You place your stuff around the room. The room also has a TV screen that's showing Whale-Vision at the moment. Nakii is swimming through some sort of tunnel that's big enough for her. Is she returning to her tank at the zoo? As you watch, the tunnel that's Nakii is swimming through opens up in a massive cavern that looks it could hold well over 2,000 Nakii's.
"Where are we?" you ask.
"In a safe place" said Nakii. "I'm going to catch 40 winks myself....and don't forget about the thing I saved you"
You look around the room until you spot your Nintendo DS that you dropped. You had felt it slipped out of your pocket when you fell into Nakii's tank. You didn't notice that it was swallowed along with you. It's bone dry and is still working. Smiling, you climb into the blubber bed, which is very comfortable indeed. You fall asleep within minutes.


-------------

Nakii....what brings you here? You have your orders

Can't I have this human? He's so nice

Out of the question. You know what humans are like. Do you forget that humans have hunted us almost to extinction? Do you forget that humans keep polluting this planet and they spill oil in our oceans?

No, but this human is...

ENOUGH! ....You will dispose of the human tomorrow or I'll hunt you down and devour you. Is that clear?

....Yes
1531111121121112111121.title: Plot Development

15311111211211121111211.content:
You wake up the next morning in the comfortable blubber bed. The only way you can tell it is morning is due to the Whale-Vision TV showing a bright sunrise and the surrounding blue sea. There also seem to be a small timestamp at the corner of the screen that reads 7:14AM. Do whales like Nakii always enjoy the sunrise like this?

"Good morning. You just woke up in time to see the sunrise", said Nakii telepathically, "The sun is always the most beautiful here in the South Pacific, as humans called it. If you want to, you can use the shower room in the 'Personal Bedroom' to freshen yourself up on this lovely morning."

As you looked bleary-eyed at the Whale-Vision TV, you saw the sky and clouds gradually turn from a light pink to blue, signaling the beginning of a new day. Strangely, the TV also provides you with the sound that Nakii is hearing outside. You hear the blowing winds and the sound of water gently lapping onto the body of the blue whale. A few minutes later, you got off from the soft blubber bed and head for the shower room that is connected to your bedroom. The shower room is quite large; it looks like one you would expect in a typical house. On one side, there is a shower that looks like it's also made from blubber and on the other, there is a bath tub you could use to relax in. You entered the shower and began cleaning yourself. Strangely, there is hot freshwater coming from the nozzle. Maybe, the water comes from the "Freshwater Tank" and is heated with electricity from Nakii's heart. And to your surprise, there are soaps and shampoos in the shower room. The fragrance was excellent; the smell is kind of like sea breeze. Upon closer inspection, you discover that they are also 'made in Nakii'. You wonder how much more of these stuffs is Nakii capable of producing independently. After showering, you dried yourself and returned to the bedroom. The Whale-Vision is now showing Nakii traveling in sun-drenched waters heading for somewhere else.


You now wanted to continue your exploration of Nakii's body but you also wanted to spend more time talking about stuffs with Nakii.
15311111211211121111211.title: A Beautful Morning

choices: You find something under the water
You and Nakii talk while you're walking
153111112112111211112111.content:
You decide to explore Nakii's body a bit more before talking to her. But where to go exactly? You think on where to go, absently watching Whale-Vision on the TV. The South Pacific Ocean is beautiful in the morning, but it looks like it's trying to cloud up. You then make the decision on exploring the 'Birth Chamber' just to be random. You walk out of the room and head for the spinal cord metro. Once you get to the Nakii-Metro, you skip ahead through several stations before you reach the correct Station.
It's a bit of a walk to get to the Birthing Chamber--Nakii's womb by any other name. You walk through narrow tunnels that twist and turn, but finally you reach the chamber. If the second stomach was huge, it was nothing compared to the Birthing Chamber. It's so big that you can't see the other side! The whole chamber looks like a small inland ocean. You come to the "shore" and see something huge looming off in the distance, almost too far away to see.
"This chamber is usually filled when I'm carrying a baby" came Nakii's voice. "If I end up carrying one, that is. The thing you see off in the distance are my ovaries"
The ovaries look to be bigger than you by a considerable scale.


"Care for a swim?" asked Nakii.

"I'm...I can go for a swim" you say.

"Good" said Nakii.

All of a sudden, a chute-like tube shoots up from the "ocean" and attaches itself to your belly button! It could only be an umbilical cord!

"You don't need a SCUBA suit here" giggled Nakii's voice in you head.

You shrug, and rush into the ocean. Once you get a good distance away from the shoreline, you dive under the water. You don't have to breath while you have the umbilical cord attached to you, but you really can't stop breathing the normal way. Even though you thought you would drown breathing underwater, you feel a thick blockage somewhere in your throat that's not allowing any water to get pass. It's a weird sensation to say the least. You can almost see perfectly under the water. Once you've reach the bottom of the chamber, you walk along the floor.
153111112112111211112111.title: Exploration Continues

1531111121121112111121111.content:
You are now walking underneath the 'ocean' within Nakii's birth chamber and with an umbilical cord attached to you. The umbilical cord is providing you oxygen underneath these bodily fluids. You can feel Nakii automatically causing your lungs to inhale and exhale with fresh air pumped in from the cord through your belly button. The surrounding birth fluids have a faint blue coloration to it. Although Nakii made a blockage in your throat to prevent you from breathing while under the fluids, you still inadvertently opened you mouth and got a taste of the fluid. The taste is somewhat sweet like some kind of flavorless soda.

It is an other-worldly experience for you. To explore the birth chamber of a blue whale, now that's something you never knew you could do, let alone possible.

As you walk along the bottom of the chamber, you spotted a faint shape some distance away from you. At this distance, you still cannot make out what it actually is, so you decided to take a closer look. The object gradually got larger the closer you move toward it. After walking for minute the object comes into view.

The object is a semi-transparent sac of some kind; resembling an enlarged version of the ovaries you seen previously at the surface of the birth chamber. There are some pulsating red veins running along the entire thing. The sac is giving off a yellow-bluish hue as if it is beckoning for you to enter it. You got curious and ask Nakii what is the huge sac for.

"That is the birth museum that I have created just for you.", Nakii said telepathically, "Once you enter it, you can learn all there is to know about the birth process of blue whale like me and, most of all, you can also experience the process in a "simulation room" within my museum."

"But unfortunately, I haven't quite 'completed' the museum yet and I would only open the museum during night to 'fit the atmosphere'...well, you know. So you may have to come back at a later time. But don't worry, you'll still get to visit it "

When you heard this, you were quite disappointed. So you went toward the 'entrance' to the birth museum. The entrance has a slimy glass door with the word Nakii's Birth Museum written on it. On the door, there is also a time table for the 'operating hours' of the museum: Operating Hours: 6:00PM-5:00AM.

There is also a note written on a small piece of paper addressed specifically to you:

Welcome to Nakii's Birth Museum. Thank you for your strong interest in continuing to explore the world within me and I'm happy that you have come all the way down here to the "Birth Chamber" to visit the museum. But the museum is still uncompleted right now. I promise you that it will be ready tonight and you won't be let down by the contents inside that I've prepared for you.

--Nakii


Nakii also senses your disappointment, but the blue whale remained optimistic and cheerful.

"I'm sorry about that", Nakii said, "But....there are still plenty of stuff for you to explore within me, right?"

"Since it's the morning now, you can get some breakfast at my "Restaurant" or you can play in my 'Computer Room'."

"So, where do you want to go?", asked Nakii
1531111121121112111121111.title: Nakii's Birth Museum

15311111211211121111211111.content:
You realize that you're hungry, so you decide to head for Nakii's Restaurant. You walk out of the mini-ocean in the birth chamber and head to the nearest Station of the Nakii-Metro. Once you get to the Nakii-Metro, you push the button to the Restaurant. The Nakii-Metro zips past several stations before coming to a rest at a station that was somewhat smaller than the other stations you've been to. You walk through several tunnels until you come to a short staircase, After climbing the staircase, you enter the restaurant. It's a large room with a wall and ceiling that shows Whale-Vision so that the restaurant looks like its actually on the outside of Nakii's body. As you enter the restaurant, you see that Nakii is still on the surface, heading towards a far-off island. You walk up to a podium that has a sign on it: Welcome to Nakii's Restaurant. Please seat yourself.


See you another sign that shows you the 'specials'


Today's Specials


Tuna
Hamburger
Shrimp
Sushi
The Feast



You take a seat next to the wall with the incredible view. A moment later, a menu pops up on the table.
15311111211211121111211111.title: You can get anything you want...

choices: Head to Nakii's Computer Room first
153111112112111211112111111.content:
You sit at your table, flabbergasted and curious, looking at the setting of "Nakii's Restaurant." The restaurant itself is far larger than the one in Nakii's brain (holo-deck) that you encountered the previous night. As Nakii has made her interior entirely for you, there is only a large table that is 3 times the size of the typical household dinner table; like one that you have frequently seen at a banquet or so. There also only two seats of which one is right beside yours. Presumably, this is to allow the virtual human Nakii to sit with you should she be accompanying you. And another important difference from the holo-deck restaurant: real food can be served here and all the fishes and shrimps are either from Nakii's "Food Storage" stomach or freshly caught within the last few hours. The table your sitting at is situated at the dead center of the room.

As you watched the choices of food on the menu, "The Feast" has attracted the most attention, because you consider the other entrees to be too mundane or commonplace. The last choice on the sign really intrigues you. "The Feast?" What could that be? Nakii couldn't possibly prepare that many food at once (let alone variety) and since when does she learn to cook?

"I see that you want to know more about "The Feast.", said Nakii cheerfully, "Well, 'The Feast' consists of a wide a array of exotic foods that humans probably haven't tried before. Examples include jellyfish, krill, sharks, kelp, etc. But as a blue whale, I frequently eat those for my meals. So... you are about to become the first human who is going to eat a whale's diet. And for your information, I learned to cook from my observation back at the zoo restaurant. There is a underwater viewing window in the restaurant that allows me to see how you humans prepared your food and I find the way you eat rather complex and unique. Anyway, let's back to our main topic: Would you like to try out 'The Feast'?"

"That's sounds exotic," you said, "I think I'll might just skip my usual foods for today and try the 'feast' you are talking about."

"Excellent choice! Please wait for a moment as I prepare your food.", said Nakii.
Later on, Nakii served the "Feast" on several colorful plates delivered straight from her 'internal kitchen'.

For an hour, you gorge through several type of dishes you never ate before but tastes superb anyway:

--Jellyfish Salad with Seafood Sauce
--Nakii's Kelp Soup
--Marinated Seafood
--Grilled Shark Meat
--Baked Krill Rolls
--Seaweed Jello

When you finished the 'feast', you are completely stuffed and, frankly, a little bit disoriented from the quick eating. You tilt you head up toward the 'ceiling' and look at the panoramic Whale-Vision, which now shows Nakii closing in on the secluded island you saw earlier.

"Nakii, that was an excellent breakfast. I never ate my breakfast in such huge amounts before. This is a first." , you said.

"Heh-heh, I'm glad that you like it and you can have my "special feast" any other time you want", Nakii replied gleefully, "Since it will be several more hours before we arrive at that huge uninhabited island, would you like to go somewhere else within me; namely the "Computer Room" or the "Inner Sanctum"?

"I have more secrets in both of these locations and you can visit both in whatever order you like."

"Which place do you want to go first?"
153111112112111211112111111.title: Ask about 'The Feast'

choices: Play with something in the Computer Room
1531111121121112111121111111.content:
You head for Nakii's Computer Room, considering the fact that you haven't used computers for at least a day. Nakii has told you that the Ocean-Net is an equivalent of the ocean animals' Internet, which has you curious about the contents.

You boarded the Nakii Metro and set the dial to "Computer Room". Half an hour later, you arrived at a station marked "Nakii's Computer Room." You disembark from the 'personal mover' and set on your path toward the tunnel.

At the end of the tunnel is the Computer Room. It is a medium-sized chamber that looks similar to a large playroom. There is a computer with a huge screen that is displaying an "Ocean-net" logo on one side of the room. Although Nakii said that this is a computer room, it looks more like a gaming room primarily because of the countless devices on a shelf that resemble gaming consoles you have never seen before.

You went toward the computer screen to start playing with it. To your surprise, there is no keyboard for you to type, there is only a flat glassy panel which looks like you can touch. When you placed your hand onto the glass, the large computer screen instantly refreshes and displayed a message:

"Welcome to Nakii's Computer, you are now accessing the Ocean-Net, a secret network designed by sea animals to facilitate communication. You can access these information within Nakii without anyone knowing about it."

After the welcome screen, the screen refreshes to a standard desktop with several icons. By moving your hand on the glass panel you move a pointer over the icon, which then an explanation for each icon appears before you.

Klicker- Information on all marine life we will encounter. Essentially an encyclopedia of the ocean around us.

Ocean-Net- Get the latest events and things that is currently happening in the sea, and virtually everywhere. The Ocean-net can be also used to access the "human" Internet which I think you would need since you got to know what is going on back in your world.

NakiiPod- A collection of some of my favorite 'human' movies like Free Willy, Finding Nemo, Jaws, etc.

SeaMii- Allows you to see what other sea animals are seeing.

Oceania-Talk- Allows you to talk to "Nakii's friends" much like you humans use Instant Messenger. For example, you could talk to Shamu, which is a very good friend of mine I met at another marine park, and see what she is seeing right now, much like my Whale-Vision.

Nakii Console- These are video games that you may play while inside the computer room. They are mostly ocean-themed, I hope that you willl try all of them; I have a collection of more than 1000 games.

What do you decide to do?
1531111121121112111121111111.title: Head to Nakii's Computer Room

choices: You and Shamu talk some more
15311111211211121111211111111.content:
You're interested in the Oceania-Talk and you click the icon. Moments later, you see several options. First, you could talk one-on-one with one of Nakii's Friends, or you could enter a "chat room" of sorts. Curious, you take a peek at the chat rooms. There's a total of 20 chat rooms;



Whales Only 220 in room 5 of Nakii's Friends are in this room

The Blowhole 32 in room Homosexual Marine Life One of Nakii's Friends is in this room
Moby Dick's Stomach 43 in room
Shark Attack! 120 in room
Kelpless 30,023 in room
Jellybabies 10,202 in room
Down with Humans 120,234 in room 2 of Nakii's Friends are in room


You pause when you see one of the names of the chat rooms has been marked out so you can't see the title of it. When you try to enter the room, a big "access denied" sign is flashing. There's also a message that tells you that the crossed-out chatroom has been blocked by Nakii. You shrug your shoulders and continue to read the list of chatrooms. The other chatrooms are full of....marine wildlife. There's 3 more chatrooms that are crossed out:

Oil is Death
The Fish Net
MDSOHH

Before you could ask Nakii something, a chat window pops up.

Shamu

Hey Nakii, How's things?


You wait for a beat before you answer.

Nakii's Traveler

Hi there

Shamu

Why hello there....Nakii told me about you

Nakii's Traveler

She did? When?

Shamu

Last night after you went to sleep :)


Just then, another chat window opens up......or it tries to. You see it for a microsecond before it vanishes. You didn't even see what was written down in that other chat window.


Nakii's Traveler

figures

Shamu

hehe
15311111211211121111211111111.title: Chatting up Shamu

153111112112111211112111111111.content:
You continue to talk with Shamu, the killer whale.

Nakii's Traveler
---So, how are you doing lately, Shamu? I'm a big fan of yours. Got every one of your items at souvenir shop at SeaWorld.

Shamu
---Nothing much. Just performing for humans like I always do :P Getting a lot of applause recently. Btw, how are you doing in Nakii?

Nakii's Traveler
---Nakii's so cool on the inside. Explored a lot of place inside her. It's unbelievable!

Shamu
---LOL, that's good. Wait until you see me. I'm just as cool as Nakii and I could also do more. i hope to see you soon :D

Nakii's Traveler
---Yeah, me 2. So, what kind of ability can you do now as a demonstration? I want to know more.

Shamu
---Hmm...Since it's less than 10 minutes until my next performance, do you wanna try out my Shamu-View? More or less, it's similar to my friend's Whale-Vision.

Nakii's Traveler
---That sounds interesting. I want to see it.

Shamu
---Sure. Just give me a second....

Just then, a separate screen appeared at the side of the chat window. The window is showing some kind of aquatic tank and the view is constantly shifting at a high speed. Suddenly, the view in the video window suddenly broke the water surface and lurched into the air. You then saw bleachers full of people, cheering and supporting something in the aquarium. There is something very familiar about this place, you think. It struck you that you are now at SeaWorld's Shamu stadium and you're looking at a performance through Shamu's eyes. Because you can't see Shamu directly, it looks more like a roller-coaster water ride from you point-of-view, complete with twist and turns, up and downs. Although it's a bit dizzying, you still like the experience. After several other tricks and a finale involving wetting the spectators, Shamu has the crowd screaming. Shamu then swam deeper into the water and head for own her tank. Then the transmission ended.

Shamu
---Like my performance?

Nakii's Traveler
---It's spectacular and unique, in some ways.

Shamu
---Yea. Kind of an other experience when you look at my performance through "Shamu-View." So where are you and Nakii heading at the moment?

Nakii's Traveler
---I' not sure. We're somewhere in the south Pacific heading for some uninhabited islands.

Shamu
--- O-O... You've gotten that far already. I knew that Nakii's a fast swimmer but I never knew that she could go that fast cause she's so large and bulky.

Suddenly another name popped up in the chat window.

Nakii
---Shamu! I heard that! You better not bad mouth me again.

Shamu
--Sorreee, Nakii! :P Hope you won't mind. Say, can we meet up in the Pacific today?

Nakii
---LOL Sure we can. And I want to better introduce you to the human.

Shamu
---That sounds like a great idea. Will arrive in about 7hrs....well, that's about it, ttyl! :P

Nakii's Traveler
---See ya later, too.

The chat ended with a 'Thank you for using Oceania-Talk' message.

Since it hours before evening when the "Birth Museum" opens or when Shamu shows up, you decided to play with the other functions, especially the Ocean-net. You always wanted to know what ocean animals are talking about.

Do you check the Ocean-Net or try the other functions?
153111112112111211112111111111.title: You and Shamu talk some more

choices: Check the prevous chat message that popped up
1531111121121112111121111111111.content:
"It just keep getting better", you thought. First there's Nakii the blue whale, then later you'll be meeting the most famous killer whale in the world. You are so eager to meet Shamu because since you first met her at the marine park a year ago, you're secretly in love with her. And now, you found out that Shamu has just as many secrets as Nakii do (which you hope includes a 'human' representation of herself).

You check out more of Nakii's friends on the Oceania-Talk but only a few of them are on the chat system:
- Dolphins: 17 friends Flipper is on (1 of 20)
- Whales: 22 friends Shamu and Willy are on (2 of 30)

The rest of Nakii's friends are either not "online" or are 'busy' swimming or their various business.

Somewhere at the center of the Oceania-Talk, you also see a chat-room icon reading "Zoo". Looks like Nakii is also in touch with the animals at the zoo. You clicked the "Zoo" chat room and discovered that virtually all of the animals in the zoo has some contact with Nakii before and from the chat records, you see they talked a lot about the zoo and the outside world in general.

"The animals at the zoo are also good friends to me," you heard Nakii said, "And you know, they all agree that the zoo is quite a boring place to be. But I constantly cheered them up by promising that I'll hide them within me one day and take on some crazy adventures. And you're the first human, as I said before, to get to be on such adventure with me and later you will be joined by my close friend, Shamu. For now, just relax and take you time, to enjoy my 'Computer Room'."

Since you want to play the other function of Nakii's Computer, you hide the window for Oceania-Talk and started clicking on the Ocean-net icon. It opens some kind of net browser and you immediately saw an official "Ocean-net" site. The site looks just like one you would see on the internet, but most of the information caters to whales and other sea animals. There is also an icon that includes the latest sea temperatures, weather, and advisory. Most of the news are concerned with the best locations for good-tasting fishes, cautions about "humans within proximity", latest updates by other whales in other parts of the world.

Seeing this kind of technological sophistication only enchants you further about the "civilization" in this undersea world. What kind of advanced sea animals will you encounter later on? And maybe, this confirms the theories of scientists, you think, that sea animals are far more intelligent than humans could ever imagine.

You shifted your mind back, remembering that you haven't gotten onto the Internet ( the human one) for about one and a half day already. You recalled that the Ocean-net can also access the Internet if you want to. You asked Nakii how to do it and she replied that you just have to click on an option that says "Human Internet" on the upper-left corner and you're good to go.

Indeed, on the upper-left hand corner, there is an option that says "Human Internet." You clicked on that option, and you are immediately greeted by the familiar interface of the Internet Explorer. You started typing in the addresses of your favorite news and video-sharing sites. On the front page, a startling headline caught your attention.

Big Whale at Zoo Missing, Night-Watch not Seen
---Blue Whale at zoo gone without a trace; no explanations given; Night-Watch not seen since early last night

You continue to read about how the zoo is now searching for the whale and that the incident has become a national sensation. You promptly asked Nakii on what she planned to do about this if 'our' secrets were to be discovered.

"There is no need to worry, I've gotten a 'decoy' blue whale who is ready to take my place tonight, and by tomorrow the zoo will probably be thinking that I was sleeping in some dark corners of the vast tank back there," said Nakii telepathically, "As for you, I got several animals at the zoo to be disguised as you; as long as you're on the night shift, detection is virtually impossible."

You breath a sigh of relief at the news. As you do so, you saw the chat window at the bottom that you haven't read when you were talking with Shamu.

What is the content of the chat message?
1531111121121112111121111111111.title: Browse the Oceanet/ More on Oceania-Talk

choices: You head for the mouth, wanting to get away from Nakii
You go to the personal bedroom to be alone
15311111211211121111211111111111.content:
The chat message box you've missed some minutes before catches your eye. The title of the chat box is simply "Leviathan". Curious, you enlarge the chat box and see that while you were talking with Shamu, Nakii had been talking to someone else. As you read the chat box, your eyes go wide with shock and you wonder why Nakii hasn't closed the chatbox yet...maybe she wants you to read what she said to this Leviathan? What is a Leviathan anyway? As far as you know, a leviathan is a legendary sea monster that's mentioned in the Bible. Maybe Nakii is too absent minded to close the chat box, since she is still talking to this Leviathan.



----Leviathan

Nakii, it's been a while since we both talked about your little traveler. I sense that the human is still alive within you. When do you plan on taking care of him?

----Nakii

I don't plan on killing him. I'm not a murderer and neither is the human inside me

----Leviathan

You can't trust humans, Nakii.....they're the ones who spoiled the earth.

----Nakii

Have you heard of PETA? or the ASPCA? Not all humans are our enemies, O Fishy One

----Leviathan

Don't get smart with me, Nakii. Remember who you're talking with here. I'm no two-bit whale or any other marine life that humans know about. I AM LEVIATHAN!

----Nakii

Not that speech again.....It's soooo boring!

Leviathan

If you aren't planning to kill the human, what are you doing in the South Pacific? Are you going to strand him on that island of yours?

Nakii

None of your beeswax! :P

Leviathan

When I get my tentacles around you..... I'll....

Nakii

Then come and get me. I gave the human my pearl yesterday....think I'm afraid of you now?

Leviathan

O_O YOU WHAT?! ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND??

Nakii

I'm sick and tired of you and your high and mighty talk. I'm sick and tired following your orders. I'm tired of luring humans into my tank just to kill them in cruel ways! I'm not listening to your orders anymore and I'm sure I'm not alone on this. Have you heard the gossip on "OceanBook" ? Your reign is coming to an end, monster!!

Leviathan

.................it seems I have misjudged you, Nakiiaddanlynali. Hmmm.....so you're letting the human read our little chat, are you? You're losing your touch, my dear.

Nakii

He's reading.....?


"You killed.....humans?" you manage to choke out, suddenly finding your surroundings not so welcoming anymore. You rush out of the Computer Room.
15311111211211121111211111111111.title: Leviathan Chat

As soon as you reached your destination, you quickly swam out to sea. "Wait!" Nakii cried out. But you kept swimming, not wanting to look back. After what seemed like hours of swimming, you finnaly lost sight of Nakii.
