1531111121121112111121111111111111.content: You saw in the distance an island. Thrilled by the discovery, you start swimming faster. As you neared the island, you were disappointed. The island was only a small hill of sand with a few palm trees around. "I guess this is better then nothing" you say to yourself. You find a comfortable spot on the sand and fall asleep, not knowing tomorrow will bring.

15311111211211121111211111111111112.title: Nakii or Shamu find you

choices: Try examining the pearl one last time.
153111112112111211112111111111111121.content:
As you slept soundly, you felt a gentle nudging on your side. You woke up and saw Nakii, floating next to you. She was very sad, she had to keep shaking away tears from her face. "I though I would find you hear...." She forced a smile and said "This is the island the leviathan was talking about." She said. You thought back to the chat and remembered that the leviathan did say something about and island of Nakii's.

"It's cold out hear, why don't you come back inside and I'll explain everything." Nakii said soothingly. You agreed and walked into her cavernous mouth and let her swallow you. Even though you wanted answers about the leviathan, you felt better to be in Nakii were it was safe and warm. You walked over to the NakiiMetro and pushed the dial for the "Personal Bedroom." You took a seat on the bed. "Thanks for coming for me." You said. "Your welcome" She said.

You decided to see what time it was, midnight is what it seemed to be. Nakii broke the silence and said. "I want to explain...." You immediately started listening.

Nakii began her explanation...."It all started when I moved to the Zoo. I had moved into the zoo because an oil spill were I used to live. I was able to slip in and out of the park and go on nightly swims. That's when I met the Leviathan. He told me that I should take my revenge on humans by killing humans. Over four months, I....I lured and killed humans in various ways. I always tried my best to make there deaths quick and painless, but the Leviathan kept telling me that I should torture make there deaths slow and torturous. I wanted to stop killing humans, but I was under Leviathan's spell."

"Who or what is the Leviathan?" You ask.

"I never actually seen him or it....all I know is it lives in the deepest and darkest hole in the ocean. I don't even know what it looks like. I was under his spell for a year before I finally snapped and told him I wasn't going to kill anymore humans. I decided to talk to a human and you were the only one who seemed to care about me." Nakii replied.

"What about the pearl?" You asked.

"Oh, that?" Nakii stated. "The Leviathan gave it to me as a tool for killing humans. I never used it. I'm not sure what it does, but the Leviathan seemed to be scared of it." Nakii said.

"How did she give you the pearl if you never met him." You ask.

"I have no idea. All I know is the Leviathan is a self-proclaimed lord of the sea as well as a Hellmounth." Nakii replied.

"What's that?" You ask.

"According to Shamu, the Leviathan is one of the seven Princes of Hell." Nakii said. "Shamu knows more about the Leviathan then any other animal in the sea."
"He's some sort of Demon?!" You asked in a shocked voice.

"Whatever he is, he isn't normal." Nakii replied.

You took another look at the pearl and asked yourself. "Why would the Leviathan give something he is scared of?" You tried examining the pearl again, but you couldn't figure anything out.

Nakii decided to break the silence with some news. "Well have to meet shamu half-way there. Apparently well meet up faster." Nakii continued. "Well be there in about an hour." Nakii finished. You thought to yourself. How were you going to fill an hour? Nakii, who read you mind came up with two suggestions. "Well, you could either explore my body while you wait. Or you could just relax until Shamu arrives.

You pondered to yourself and finally choose to......

As you looked at the sun-rise, you though of what happended yesterday and asked yourself questions. "Why did Nakii kill humans?" "Is this laviathan looking for me?" "Is...anyone looking for me?" You asked yourself. Then you made the choice to.....

Is it Shamu?

or

1531111121121112111121111111111112112.title: Friend or Foe?

153111112112111211112111111111112.content:
You can't believe what you've just seen on the chat system. Nakii...killed humans before. The sudden emergence of this "Leviathan" character has set your world spinning and made you numb from complete shock. From the chat, Nakii seem to know this 'being' for some times already. Although it is obvious that Nakii is in strong disagreement with the "Leviathan", the revelation of Nakii's past still struck you hauntingly. In tears, you rushed out of the Computer Room. You boarded the Nakii Metro and without uttering a single a word, you set the dial for "Personal Bedroom".

Initially, you thought about leaving Nakii's body for good, but you're now in the middle of the Pacific Ocean and there isn't any islands around here. Leaving her would only make the problem worse and the risk of running into the mysterious Leviathan, a thing so determined to eradicate humans, made you reconsider.

Arriving your "Personal Bedroom", you locked the fleshy door behind you and fall onto the 'blubber bed' crying........

"Why?...Why didn't Nakii told me the truth, about this whole debacle?", you thought to yourself sobbingly, "Nakii!!!!! This is just not true. Why have you done this? You killed people for goodness sake. Give me an explanation, I have the right to know what happened. Who is this Leviathan and what are the connection between you and him?!! I NEED SOME ANSWERS................."

Nakii remained silent; stunned, unable to speak to you and put up her explanation. It's a long story....

You saw the Nakii plush toy that you got at the store the other day and, in your sadness, you hugged it tightly. Strangely, although the toy still bear a smile on it, there is a subtle sadness on her velvety face as if it knows your predicament. The fluffy feel of the plush has offered you little comfort in our current state. You looked into the plush Nakii's blue eyes in search for answers. You more you looked at her, the sadder you become, until you finally broke down. You cried on and on.....until you unknowingly fell asleep.... "Nakii...."

Meanwhile, Nakii also sensed your outrage, disbelief, and sadness. She had since cut her chat on Oceania-Talk with the 'Leviathan' and permanently blocked him off. His words still has a reeling effect on her. She had originally joined the 'Leviathan' for the same reason he had warned her; that humans are bent on destroying the undersea world. She thought that he was right and she followed his order by killing several people at the zoo. But as time went by, she got more and more disillusioned about the Leviathan's ambition of destroying humans. Then, it reached a breaking point, her meeting with the night-watch that completely changed her view of humans.

Her thoughts are now chaotic with conflicting feelings and countless flashbacks of her encounters with the Leviathan.

Nakii felt that you're in the "Personal Bedroom" within her, she decided to leave you alone for the moment. And when you finally calm down at a later time, she knew that she will have to prepare herself for a long explanation that she has to give. Although she accidentally left that chat window open for your full viewing, Nakii knew that she will have to tell the human about the "Leviathan" sooner or later. The whole 'falling out' moments ago has further strengthened the blue whale's resolve to break with her past.... and strengthen her bond with the human inside her.....

"I'm so sorry.....", sobbed Nakii, "I really am....."

A few hours later....

You woke up from the blubber bed. You still vividly remember the wordings in that chat window. Still frustrated at Nakii, you quietly moved toward the Nakii TV. You switched it on, the Whale-Vision is now showing a moonlit ocean, but you also realized that Nakii is crying because there is constant blurring and jerking in the view. You could also sense her sadness, by the slow (almost 'dragging') pace of her swimming.

"....You've gotten up....", said a melancholic Nakii, "I think I have to tell you.... the whole story. But do not worry about that Leviathan, I have completely broke away from him and I no longer follow his orders. Please forgive me..... I didn't kill those humans by my own will...... I was forced to do it by the Leviathan. If I refused......he threatened to destroy the city (the one near the zoo) in one blow..... both humans and animals alike. Let us..... just forget about that awful conversation I had with that..... "unspeakable thing " and just.... move on, can we?....... "

Sensing truth in her shaky statement, you gave a quiet and imperceptible nod.

Nakii began her explanation, "It all started when I moved to the zoo......
153111112112111211112111111111112.title: Alone in the Personal Bedroom

choices: You try to figure out the pearl
1531111121121112111121111111111121.content:
"...I moved into the zoo because...well, there was this huge oil spill where I used to live" started Nakii. "nothing happened until I was at the zoo for about two months...then I came into contact with a being that named itself 'Leviathan' when I was swimming in the Northern Atlantic. He said that humans were the cause of the oil spill that destroyed my birth place. And he suggested to me that I can take my revenge by killing humans....I told him no, that I won't take out my revenge on humans; humans might've caused the oil spill, but I doubted they did it on purpose. That's when Leviathan threatened to smash the human city near the zoo, and take out the zoo as well. Over four months, I....I killed humans in various ways. I tried to make their deaths quick and painless...but the Leviathan told me to torture humans as much as I could. I wanted to stop killing, but Leviathan kept forcing me too...."

"What is this 'Leviathan' ?" you ask.

"I never actually saw him...or 'it' in person" said Nakii. "I know he lives deep in the ocean, much deeper than it seems possible. So I don't know what this Leviathan even looks like. But I was under his spell for almost a year...then, I kind of snapped at him and said I wasn't going to kill anymore. That's when I decided to talk to a human...when you fell into my tank, I...."


"What's with the pearl?" you ask, taking it out of your pocket.

"Oh, that?" asked Nakii. "that was given to me by Leviathan as a tool for killing humans...I didn't use it once. I'm not sure what it does, or even how it works but Leviathan is afraid of it as well"

"Hold on" you say. "how could Leviathan give you anything if you haven't met him?"

"I don't know" said Nakii. "nobody knows much about Leviathan...just that he's the self-proclaimed lord of the oceans, as well as the Hellmouth"

"Hellmouth?" you ask.

"According to Shamu, Leviathan is one of the Seven Princes of Hell...." said Nakii. "Shamu knows more about Leviathan than any other marine animal"

"So....Leviathan is a demon?!" you ask, totally shocked.

"He's not normal, whatever he is" said Nakii.

"Why would he give you something that he's scared of?" you ask, examining the pearl. It doesn't look extraordinary. You try to twist one end of it; it turns but nothing happens.
1531111121121112111121111111111121.title: Prince of Hell

15311111211211121111211111111111211.content:
You sit on the blubber bed still trying to figure out what exactly does the pearl do. "This thing must be very powerful if even its owner (the Leviathan) is afraid of its potential", you thought.

The pinkish pearl seems to glow enigmatically in the dim bedroom. You tried twisting both ends of the pearl, figuring that it probably need some combination of twists and turns, much like a combination lock. After numerous attempts at guessing the combination, you gave up and placed the pearl back into your pockets. Lie down on the bed, frustrated from the lack of real progress. On one hand, you really wanted to know what exactly can the pearl do, but on the other, you did not know the 'nature' of the pearl and you're taking a serious risk guessing the combination. You think about the potential danger of being killed if you somehow activated the pearl. Right now, it is best to leave the pearl alone and maybe ask Shamu for more details when she gets here.

You remember that you got the pearl at the Nakii Store and....Wait a second! Didn't Nakii told you that the pearl allowed you to change her size at your will? If she didn't know how to use it, how could she know about its size-changing power? In curiosity, you asked Nakii.

"That is the only function of the pearl I managed to discover", said Nakii telepathically, "I could control my size just by thinking; I once made myself as massive as large island. But, the it's true purpose remains a mystery."

"Well, I guess that when the Leviathan entrusted you with this 'powerful thing', he probably didn't expect you to turn against him", you said, "From what I know, it looks like the Leviathan had made a big mistake in assuming that you will remain loyal to him and serve his interests."

"Additionally, I cut off my Oceania-Talk communication with him so he won't be harassing us with his stupid messages and speeches, for now", said Nakii.

Just then, the Whale-Vision on the TV set displayed a ticker: 'Nakii's Friend approaching. ID: Shamu----Orca ETA: 1 min'

Looks like Shamu has finally arrived at the request of Nakii this afternoon. You look at the scene on the Whale-Vision, you see a shape forming near the horizon, gradually getting closer. Moments later, you recognized the distinctive white markings and shimmering black body of an orca. Finally, Shamu came to a stop right in front of the Whale-Vision. Maybe it's just you, but you never notice how beautiful Shamu look right now. From Nakii's point of view, the orca is just about 1/8 of her size.

The television displayed a message "Voice Signal Relay Enabled", then you heard both Nakii and Shamu talking in your head, her voice sounds melodious and soft:

Shamu: Nakii, I came as fast as I could. I encountered a storm which slowed me down a bit.
Nakii: That's alright. How are you doing recently?
Shamu: I'm good but the daily performances at the park is demanding. Has me all exhausted. I think it a good idea for me to get out once in a while.
Nakii: I see... Well, let's get down to the points. Long story short. Today, I got into contact with the Leviathan again. He wanted me to dispose of the human I'm keeping. But I didn't like the idea and got into a heated argument with him. The human accidentally saw my chat window...
Shamu: If that's the case, did the chat revealed anything to the human?
Nakii: He saw my comment, saying that I used to kill humans when I worked for the Leviathan. He got frustrated and depressed. Locked himself in my "Personal Bedroom" until a while ago. I explained to him that I used to be under the Leviathan's spell, doing stuffs completely against my will. I told him that it was he who reinforced my positive feelings toward humans. He accepted an we've reconciled.
Shamu: Good thing that he didn't encounter the Leviathan himself or he wouldn't be living right now.
Nakii: I also showed him the pearl and he has it now.
Shamu: You did?! Did you tell him about the potential danger of that thing?
Nakii: Yes, but even I do not know how to use it.
Shamu: Preferably, we shouldn't even have that pearl....Say, can I talk to the human now?
Nakii: Sure! Go ahead.....

You saw Shamu turn toward the Whale-Vision and began swimming and waving toward Nakii's eyes: "Hi there, human. Remember we talked on the Ocean-Talk and I showed you my performance? I bet you did. I like to meet you now. Can you hear, me?"

You didn't know how to Shamu literally see you because you're within Nakii. You saw a curious-looking Shamu waiting for your reply on the Whale-Vision. When you're pondering how can you respond to her, you spotted what looks like a web-cam on the top of the TV set. The web-cam is round and made from flesh with veins in place of wire and what looks like a dark pupil in place of a camera. You feel around the web cam for the switch and turned it on. When you did so, the screen reads "Nakii-Eyecam enabled".

From the outside, Shamu was surprised to see Nakii's eye suddenly turn into some kind of monitor with an image coming into focus. Since the image was projected on the eye, it has a fish-eye effect to it. Then gradually, Shamu sees a figure in the image before her: a bedroom and there sitting on the bed was the human.

Shamu: Hey, I can perfectly see you from here, human.
You: Huh?
Shamu: I can see you in Nakii's eye. You must have activated the Eyecam.
You: What is that?
Shamu: It's a device that allows humans within a whale to communicate with another whale at close range. The advantage is that it provides a visual medium where we can see each other directly. Think of it as a 2-way camera. Anyway, you look so great, you must have a lot fun with Nakii!
You: Thanks Shamu.
Shamu: I heard from Nakii that you learned of the Leviathan and have possession of that pearl, is it?
You: Yeah.
Shamu: Since you are new to the culture of the sea, let me give you some more information. I'm more knowledgeable about the Leviathan, the ocean, the pearl, and the Princes of Hell. Do you want to hear more?
15311111211211121111211111111111211.title: No Progress with the Pearl/ Shamu's arrival

153111112112111211112111111111112111.content:
"What do you know about...all of this?" you ask.

Shamu: I can't tell you all of the details...but I can tell you that the pearl and others like it are far more older Leviathan...even though Leviathan won't admit it
You: Older than...? How old is this Leviathan....and how do you know so much?
Shamu: Just under 3,000 years old....the pearls are closer to 10,000 years old. As for how I know so much about Leviathan and his ilk...I can't tell you that much
You: Why not?
Shamu: .....let's just say I'm being watched by the higher powers
You: Well....what can you tell me?
Shamu: Well......I know that there are seven princes of hell and that Leviathan is the Sixth Prince. I know that each of the Princes holds something called the Pearl of Destiny. You only carry but a small piece of the Pearl and you should feel lucky that you don't have the entire Pearl. I don't know where the Pearl came from...but it's a powerful artifact that helped to create the plane known as hell.
You: Uhh.....wait a minute....how do...?
Shamu: I can't tell you how I know....let's say that the original Shamu passed down knowledge.
You: The or..oh, of course. The first Shamu died in 1971
Shamu: right... (something about this response makes you believe that Shamu isn't telling you something; as if, she's withholding info)
You: Where does this Leviathan live?
Shamu: In a place called The Tartarus Depths.....don't tell me how to get there because I don't know ...not even sure it's in our plane even
You: Plane?
Shamu: Plane of Existence. There's other Planes besides this one you know.
: Of course
Shamu: I know that Leviathan can't cross over into our Plane easily.... lots of otherwordly red tape is involved there.
You: So you're saying that we're not gonna meet Leviathan?
Shamu: It's extremely unlikely
You : well...that's a relief
153111112112111211112111111111112111.title: Continue to talk with Shamu

1531111121121112111121111111111121111.content:
The conversation continues between you and Shamu through the Nakii Eye-cam. A quiet Shamu fixed her eyes on Nakii's eye, now a monitor that facilitates communication between the human and the orca. The conversation reached a point where there is little for her to talk about besides the Leviathan. The events over the past few hours have taken a wild twist and completely out of her expectation; There is just too many things beyond the comprehension of the human. The Leviathan.... The Pearl....Planes of Existence..and many other issues. But for the time being, she knew that they are still out of reach of the Leviathan.

Despite the urgent matter on the Leviathan, Shamu couldn't help but notice how good-looking the young human is. The more she looked at him on the 'monitor', the more she wanted to meet him in person. "Maybe, I could let him see my little secret", Shamu thought, "He might even be surprised to learn that I could do more "things" than Nakii."

Shamu kept her thoughts to herself without letting the signal be picked up by Nakii's 'Voice-relay'. She decided to change the topic for the moment thinking that it's time it lighten up a bit after a tense day.

Shamu: Since the Leviathan is still far away from us, I think that we can talk about something more cheerful and optimistic, can we?
You: Sure. I think that we need to just temporarily out aside the whole Leviathan thing for a change. But what can we talk about?
Shamu: Hmm. Maybe we can talk some more about yourself or about what you know about me?
You: That sounds like a start. Well, I was a night-watch at the zoo that Nakii lives at. Last night, when I was feeding Nakii, she bumped me down and ate me. And then, I started an adventure within Nakii, exploring various unbelievably beautiful and other-worldly body parts in her. If it weren't for this Leviathan interlude, I would probably still be exploring Nakii right now.
Shamu: Heh-heh. Glad to hear that. I think that you like to be within Nakii, right? The other time when she tried to get another human inside her (before her meeting with the Leviathan), they panicked big time and she had to let them go.
You: Yeah. I have this little obsession of being within living things, like whales or anything huge enough that allows me to explore their innards. And Nakii has fulfilled that dream for me and her mysterious interior has made me like her even more.
Shamu: You do?!!! Frankly, I have also fantasized about similar things before. But obviously, my size made it difficult to fulfill; only Nakii is big enough to eat me. I know perfectly what you're talking about because I once allowed Nakii to try to swallow me but she was smaller back then and it didn't turn out really well.
You: But now, she's bigger and more immense. Besides, I also got this 'pearl' which can also change her size. Won't you want to try it again?
Shamu: Why yes, I've just been thinking about that. You know this is also a plus because I could finally meet you in person. Nakii has said a lot about you, talking about how much you love the ocean, how you like her, and your interesting characteristics.
You: She told all about me already? Whoa, Nakii sure is a gossiper and a good one at that.
Shamu: Additionally, do you want to know more about me too?
You: What did you mean?
Shamu: What if I tell you that I also have cool stuffs within me? Want to know more? Then let me get myself ready to enter Nakii, here I come.

This is just great, you thought, now you have Shamu to explore, a unexpected addition to other unexplored parts of Nakii.

So, What happens next?
1531111121121112111121111111111121111.title: Continue the talk

15311111211211121111211111111111211111.content:
During the conversation, you had been fingering the mysterious pearl in your pocket, wondering what it all means. First, you get swallowed up by a blue whale and you learn that something bigger is going on behind the scenes as it were. You shake your head and notice that Shamu is in front of Nakii. Time to meet Shamu in person! You exit the personal bedroom, but not before you see Shamu going into Nakii's large mouth. Christ, Nakii can open her mouth wide! You pause in front of the 'TV' to watch, all the while noticing that a certain body part of yours is reacting to Nakii eating Shamu. You just can't explain it but you always had an odd fetish with what is called 'vore'; seeing other people eating food and imagining yourself in the mouth. You're sure that the fetish of yours started with the cartoon movie Charlotte's Web when Templeton has his binge at the fair. You wouldn't want to admit that seeing that rat getting fat made you hard, especially as a young kid. You start to wonder if other animals are bigger on the inside like Nakii...or Shamu. You rush out of the bedroom and start to head for Nakii's stomach.
Once you've reached Nakii's second stomach, you see that Shamu has entered the large chamber as well. Nakii must've swallowed a lot of sea water along with Shamu because the orca is floating in deep water. Exactly how deep is anyone's guess. You come to the "shore".
"Nakii is right, you're much more handsome in person" said Shamu's voice inside your head.
You're not sure what to say to that. A Marine mammal is hitting on you! If only Shamu were human....
"Well, ready for your trip inside of me?" Shamu asks you after a moment.
"Wait a minute" you say. "how are you able to talk to me? Nakii couldn't talk to me until I was in her stomach. .."
"You ask too many questions" said Shamu's voice in your head. "here I come!" Then Shamu lunges at you with mouth wide open! Shamu's mouth doesn't open any wider than it does normally, but the lunge catches you off-guard and before you know it, your entire head is in her mouth. Shamu's breath smells strongly of fish. Shamu runs her tongue over you, making you giggle...all the while, Shamu pulls more of you into her mouth. Your head slips into her throat, and you see some kind of light coming deep within. You kick your legs off of the shore as your upper torso enters the mouth. You wiggle yourself deeper into her throat, eager to explore the innards of Shamu. What a day you're having! You're being swallowed by a whale that's in the belly of another whale! Your lower torso enters the mouth, and Shamu runs her tongue across your body...savoring your taste you can't help but think. Shamu's tongue briefly rubs against your prick. "Later" you hear Shamu's voice, giggling like mad.
In a few more moments, Shamu has eaten you and you enter into her stomach. Shamu's stomach isn't much different than Nakii's stomach; it's much more bigger on the inside than it should be. Shamu's stomach also seems more pinkish colored than Nakii's stomach. The light you saw while going down the throat is coming from what looks like a flashlight of some sort made out of fleshy material.
"So...do you eat humans as well?" you ask.
"I once ate one of my trainers at Sea World" said Shamu's voice. "he liked it in my tummy"
15311111211211121111211111111111211111.title: Enter the Orca

153111112112111211112111111111112111111.content:
As you remained in Shamu's stomach, you've gotten more and more excited about the prospect of exploring yet another whale. Now, you're in whale within another whale, bizarre yet mind-boggling. Despite being only 1/8 the size of Nakii, Shamu's interior is more or less of comparable size. You began to move through the waters in Shamu's stomach to take a closer look at the "flashlight." The fleshy-looking light source looks portable as if Shamu meant for you to carry it. Although you would describe it as a flashlight, it looks more like a brighter, thicker, and organic version of a glow-stick. You picked it up and began to shine it around the stomach, casting a muted white hue onto the orca's stomach wall.

The vastness of Shamu's stomach is unbelievable; although it's half the size of Nakii's gargantuan 2nd stomach, you still believe that it could easily accommodate a sports arena. The vastness is compounded by the echo of the water as you strode through it. The sound of Shamu's body rumbling all around you has given you a strange yet familiar feeling. You realize that this is the first sound (or impression) that you have of Nakii after she ate you and took you on this still ongoing trek.

"Umm.. Shamu. Since your interior is bigger than on the outside, as with Nakii, does that mean that you're also not an ordinary orca?", you said.

"Heh Heh...Welcome to my world, a place that is designed by myself to give whoever who enters it the "best experience" ever.", said Shamu in your head, "If you already explored Nakii so thoroughly and you love it, then wait until you explored mine. Once you got to the end of my stomach, you should see at least 7 openings leading to various 'recreational spots' in my body (there are more, saved for a later time). A lot of my trainers have enjoyed exploring and being within me; many of them utterly speechless to see the 'other side' of their famous mascot animal."

When you got to the rear end of the stomach, you saw various openings that leads to other parts within Shamu. A signboard says "Shamu-World: A New Kind of Wonder"

When you approached the first hole in the stomach, you saw a board with a list:

Area 1

Shamu's Stomach Bar- various fine-dining options prepared by Shamu...just for you...

Shamu-View: The Experience- an interactive game where you play the role of Shamu.

Shamu Museum- displays a history of Shamu with various records Shamu achieved.

Music Hall- a place that allows Shamu to sing.

Shamu-Land- a theme park that revolves around the orca.

Shamu Pleasure Resort- a small resort in Shamu's second stomach where there is countless surprises awaiting you.

Tour Internal- a Shamu-guided tour of her various body system.

"If you need any further information, please take one of the brochures on the rack

A brochure, typically like those you would encounter at well-known theme parks, packed with information of Shamu's body part. Unfolding the entire thing took you 5 folds until you have a clear view of a cross-section map of Shamu. The worlds within the orca are as numerous as Nakii; there are at least 7 areas (you're only just about to begin to explore the first one). Some of them have more than 10 attractions (or whatever Shamu likes to call them). Whoa. This will take some times to explore you, Shamu.

"Then what are you waiting for, let's start.", said Shamu in your head.

"Well, let the fun begin.", you said.
153111112112111211112111111111112111111.title: Start to explore Shamu's innards

1531111121121112111121111111111121111111.content:
"So....you've swallowed some of your trainers?" you ask as you make your way to the back of Shamu's stomach. With the flashlight's help, you see the entrance to the second stomach. There's seven other holes that lead to various parts of Shamu's innards, but you want to check out the second stomach first since you started to explore Nakii in the same manner. You're also interested in this resort in the second stomach, so you enter the hole that leads to the second stomach of Shamu.
"I swallow them late at night, when the park closes" said Shamu's voice. "I can't start to eat people in plain daylight! Although I haven't eaten any of them for awhile now"
You enter the second stomach and see that it's the same size as Nakii's second stomach--but Shamu's stomach doesn't have any 'houses' in it; instead, there's a huge building with the words "SHAMU'S PLEASURE RESORT" written in fancy letters on a sign. You walk towards the resort since it's near the middle of the stomach. You enter the resort some five minutes later and enter into what looks like a fair-sized lobby. You walk up to the counter and see the sign on the wall behind it;

Welcome to Shamu's Pleasure Resort, built for humans that Shamu has swallowed! The following services are included during your visit!

Body Massage
Shamu's Gaming Console--where you can play video games especially made by Shamu
Underwater Buffet
Cable TV! (limited programming available)
Interact with Shamu--where you'll meet Shamu in person


"What doe---" you start to say, and then you break off when you see a woman step into the lobby. The woman has tanned skin, a necklace of seashells around her neck and a large chest. Her clothes are mostly ocean colors; blue mixed with green. Her clothing looks to be made out of some kind of seaweed, but it's awfully hard to tell; it looks like any other clothing but you can tell that it's not made from cotton or whatever else they makes clothes with. The woman's eyes have a glowing quality and are amber-colored. It looks like the woman has no pupils, which makes her appearance slightly unnerving. The woman is very heavyset, but you can't even to begin to guess at her weight. She looks to be too heavy to walk on two legs, but she walks over to you and kisses you on the cheek and giggles.
"Hi there!" said the woman. "I'm Shamu! Or rather.....this is my human form"
You're reminded of Nakii's human form that you met yesterday. Nakii's human form was clearly a hologram, while this human form feels all too real! Secondly, Nakii could only manifest her human image in that 'holodeck' within her, while this is in Shamu's second stomach.
"This is my human image, but it's a lot more than that" said Shamu. "I told you I can do more stuff than Nakii can. First of all, I'm older than Nakii is, so I'm more experienced than her when it comes to manifest my human disguise. Wanna have that body massage? I'm good with my hands.....of course, I can massage you with other bits of my body..hehehee"
1531111121121112111121111111111121111111.title: Shamu Resort

choices: Head for a "date" at the Shamu Stomach Bar
1531111121121112111121111111111121111111.content:
When you heard Shamu's request, you realized that you're pretty exhausted after two consecutive days of body exploration and think that it's a good time to relax for a while, since you're technically on a vacation with whales.
"I would like a body massage, please Shamu," you said.
"It'll be my pleasure to provide you with some relaxation", said the bulky human Shamu, "Let's lie down and get ready, shall we?"

As you lie down on a fleshy bed, you begin to feel Shamu's powerful hands begin to run with extreme precision over your back. You felt her strong hands rubbing against sensitive parts of your back making you flinch reflexively with each pressing. Although she has assumed her human form, you feel that her hands are slippery and slick like the skin of a dolphin. Every rhythmic push and pull gives you an unexplainable tingle down your spine; a mixture of pain and comfort.

"Oh.....That feels so...good....", you exclaimed, "I never thought you're such a good massager."
"Hee..Hee.., thanks for the compliment, if you like this, I hope you would like some even harder."

Just then, Shamu starts to press down on you with her belly which caught you completely by surprise. Shamu's belly felt incredibly soft and it molds completely around your body. You felt her flesh moving over you, pressing down upon you. The feeling gives you creep since you never encountered any massage parlor that do such services.

"Oh...Shamu..this is outstanding....," you said.

Unbeknownst to you, Shamu reveals a wide grin at your comment.

At the end of the massage session half an hour later, you're feeling all relaxed and warm.
"Gee, thanks for the massage, Shamu", you said.
"It's always a pleasure to help you, my human," said Shamu.

You sit up and look at the bulky human Shamu for a moment... then you decided to ask her a question.

"But, I don't know if this is too much to ask about, since you told me that you are much older than Nakii is, does that mean you are also capable of doing far more than she can? I mean like can you assume several different forms like, you know, Mystique from the X-Men series?"

"Actually..I can", said Shamu boastfully, "The trainers I had eaten before have also made similar requests and I transformed into what I get from their minds. The reason I can do this is because I have no fixed (permanent) human form. In the current case, I could also change my human appearance to suit your taste. It can be anything out of the ordinary; I can assume shapes and things out of the realm of reality."

"That's great", you thought to yourself, "I'm not really a fan of huge, bulky women; you remembered an incident at the zoo when a woman even more bulky than Shamu tried to enter the turnstile at the entrance of the Africa exhibit and tripped herself. You happened to be on crowd control duty that day and that woman fell right down on you, nearly crushing you alive. You decided to not to think more about this out of fear you might hurt Shamu's feeling. Instead, you focus on thinking of the options that Shamu could transform herself into."

"I see", you said, "Hmm... what can I allow you to transform into?...", you said.

"Hold it. I think I kinda know what you want.", Shamu said gleefully.

Suddenly you saw the bulky Shamu before you start emitting a bright glow that encompassed her entire body. From her outline you can see the shape of her body becoming more and more slender and her hair becoming longer and more fluid. You stared in awe as Shamu transformed into who knows what.

After a minute, the bright glow started to dim and you take a good look at Shamu. What you see, made your jaws drop to the floor.

The woman before you has long flowing deep purple hairs, big and bright golden eyes, and an very slender shape you find quite attracting. The woman can't be real, you thought, She....she...looks more like something out of a Japanese anime.

"This is impossible, how the heck does she know I like animes and hot girls?", you thought to yourself.

She's wearing two oval hair clips on the two sides of her head and a black sleeveless summer dress with the intricate white markings of an orca. She still has a light brown tan to her skin and a curvy breast. Judging from her breathing and sighing, you bet she probably has a cute voice. All in all, she has turned into what you thought a human Shamu would be like.

Suddenly, the newly "reformed" Shamu dashed toward you and hug you tightly.

"Hi, human...",Shamu said in a slightly high squeal, "Do you like my new appearance, eh?"

"I....I...I... surely do.", you said, blushing.

"You seem..surprised about how I know about your secret hobbies, don't you?", asked Shamu. Then she lowered her voice: "It's Nakii who told me about it last night."

"Well that answers a lot of questions about you knowing more about me", you said.

"Alright. Let's keep the talks short. Say, are you feeling hungry at the moment?", asked Shamu, " If you are, wanna go to my Stomach bar for some nice meal I prepared for you?"

"Yea. I surely want to help myself to some food; I haven't eaten the whole day.", you replied, "But what's up with the 'invitation' ?"

"You've never "dated" an orca, have you?", said Shamu seductively, "Well, this is your chance! There, we have a lot to talk and share about."

Your heart is thumping rapidly from Shamu's suggestion. You've done something similar with Nakii, but she's a virtual human avatar and now, Shamu presented herself as a real girl, something entirely different.

"Alright, I'll go with you", you said.

"GREAT!!", squealed Shamu, "Then let's get going."

She dragged you by one hand through the maze of fleshy holes in her (orca) body toward the 'Stomach Bar'.
1531111121121112111121111111111121111111.title: Body Massage/ Changeable Shamu

choices: The food arrives!  The Date Continues
1531111121121112111121111111111121111111.content:
The Stomach Bar was just that; a bar within the second stomach of Shamu. It greatly resembled the 'holodeck' of Nakii's but there were differences, First of all, the theme of the bar seemed to be the sea shore rather than the blue ocean. Secondly, there were no other 'holograms' of other marine life. And perhaps the biggest difference of all was the fact that the menu wasn't limited to seafood; indeed, the menu had what any other resturant would have....just in a limited number. You asked Shamu where did she get a hold of a cow after the two of you took a seat at the bar itself.
The bar was a single large room about the size of a small living room which chair and tables dotted around the room. The bar itself was made too look like a huge sandbar. The 'kitchen' of the place was actually inside the stomach of Shamu.
"I happen to know a few places that have cows close to shore" said Shamu. "cows are delicious, but I prefer a nice juicy salmon...that's my chocolate"
As you order a nice big steak, Shamu snaps her fingers and the room is filled with marine animals to give the place some atmosphere. All of the 'holograms' look real enough, and you're amazed at how much Shamu knows about humans and their gadgets--there's a dolphin with a MP3 player (although how it could possibly fit a MP3 player over its head you've no idea). Shamu ordered a plate full of tuna and salmon. It was then you notice--after the two of you had ordered your meals--that the bar had a small dance floor big enough for perhaps four dozen people on it. The dance floor was empty at the moment.
"So...how often do you...swallow your trainers?" you ask.


Shamu tells you about the first time she had swallowed one of her trainers--a rather skinny man by the name of Gilbert Sullivan. "And yes, that was his real name" said Shamu. "his parents thought it would be funny if someone named 'Sullivan' had 'Gilbert' as their first name. I don't understand the reference myself. Anyway, I won't bore you telling you what old Gil was teaching me...training sessions are terribly boring I can tell you. Well, it was after the park had closed down for the night--the firework show had just ended over at the----oh blast, what did they call that stadium? They did ski shows during the day......." Shamu's voice trails off then and she looks to be very lost in thought for a moment or two.
"Uh...Shamu?"
"What?" asked Shamu. "oh...sorry about that, my mind likes to wander. Anyway, the firework show had just ended and people were leaving the park. Gil was all alone in my stadium....I don't remember why he was the only one there....but, he waved goodbye to me at the edge of my little pool behind the stadium. That's when I jumped up and ate him up. He must've thought I was going to kiss him. Gil liked it in my stomach once he got over the shock--which took a long time"
"I bet" you say.
1531111121121112111121111111111121111111.title: Date with Shamu

1531111121121112111121111111111121111111.content:
You and Shamu continue to converse with each other. The more you talk to Shamu, the more you like her. Shamu looks cute, no doubt because of her new "anime" look. Her large golden eyes glimmer and her dark purple hair wafts about as she moves he head. The smile on her face could give you a nosebleed. You continue is focus your gaze upon her. Her face, body shape....virtually every one of her features is something you can only fantasize about.

The Stomach Bar really is a nice place to be. The setting, the atmosphere....it's all just feels right. Despite being clearly based on a human restaurant with beach theme, Shamu has added some personal touch to it. The walls are adorned with pictures after pictures of Shamu and the tables are black-white and glossy, like the slippery skin of her orca form.

After waiting for about 5 minutes, your steak and Shamu's fish dish are ready. It food was served by a hologram dolphin-waiter. Strangely although holograms aren't supposed to be able to hold stuffs, but.... the experience is similar to the 'human' Nakii you met days ago. That was fast, you thought, considering the fact that you once waited for over 30 minutes just for the restaurant at the zoo to get a simple nacho and burger combo ready. You think that's probably because Shamu is a better chef than those squeaky teens back at the zoo and the fact that she knows you very well from her previous talks with Nakii.

The steak you ordered looks delicious and huge. What makes it unique is that the steak is carved in to shape of an orca and side vegetables arranged in a pattern to suggest ocean waves. The foods are a thoughtful reminder that you are currently within Shamu's body and a demonstration of the cooking skills she secretly learned from humans. On the other side of the table, Shamu's salmon and tuna platter looks even huger. The fishes are raw and whole (as all sea animals tend to prefer). The fishes stack up about two feet high, partially obscuring the cute human Shamu.

"So, Shamu, how's Gil doing since meeting you at the aquarium?", you asked, "Did you continue to eat him for some time?"

"Well...We continually did that for countless nights and he loved it, spending his time exploring 'my inner world' with my human form", Shamu said, "But unfortunately, he got transferred to another marine park half a year ago. info.brief_description: Having been locked inside a zoo, the animals show their true features: namely big butts
info.description:
Having been locked into [enter zoo name here], you, a lowly night watchman/zoo keeper, wander around the zoo. However, many of these animals are hungry, sometimes for more than one thing, and even the herbivores want something a little less bland than grass.

I'll allow pretty much everything. This interactive has grown alot since I first created it, and I have YOU to thank (unless you haven't added anything yet. In that case, consider your 'thank' as a deposit, or credit, or some such financial term)

By "pretty much everything" I mean "pretty much everything". There are a few exceptions. I don't really want:

- Badly written additions. If I'm in a good mood I'll edit one or two so they're better quality. If I'm not in a good mood then I'll probably just delete them. You've been warned; if you want to add to this interactive, try and make it decent quality. Poor quality additions just let people down "Ooh, a new addition!" *glances over it* "Aww... Thats shit."

- Extreme amounts of swearing. The occasional word is fine, and helps with grounding it in reality (although how realistic the rest of the content is is debatable...) but if every second word is a swear, its poor quality. Also, try and keep any ethnic or racial slurs out. They are unwelcome.

- Completely non-nonsensical storylines and going offtopic. I know, I know, this whole premise is farsical, but writing "And Tom was suddenly skydiving, and suddenly he met Bowser from the Mario games, and they played croquet together..." is just stupid. If you really want to make a storyline involving videogame characters playing gentlemanly sports, I'm sure theres an interactive somewhere on this site for that sort of stuff, but it isn't this one.

- Seriously extreme fetishes. Actually, I don't mind, as long as its well written and the title of the chapter makes it obvious what it could be about, incase people don't want to read it.

Note: Used with express permission from Ski_Hawk. He had to delete his variation of this, so he asked me to create it again and "spice it up" a bit.
